6.content:
Le Domaine du Lac-Noir
Nom : Le Manoir des Corbeaux (surnom local), officiellement "Le Domaine du Lac-Noir".

Type : Lieu / R√©sidence priv√©e.
Peu de personnes savent que le domaine est √† Yann. Kitsu seule le sait

Localisation : Situ√© dans la R√©serve Naturelle du Grand Lac, le domaine est invisible depuis la route principale. Les voyageurs ne peuvent l'apercevoir que fugitivement, √† contrebas, entre les arbres : une silhouette sombre et √©l√©gante dominant les rives sablonneuses du lac.

I. Acc√®s et Environnement Imm√©diat
L'acc√®s au domaine est une exp√©rience en soi. Depuis la route, un petit chemin de gravier fin, presque dissimul√© par la v√©g√©tation, descend en lacets √† travers une for√™t primaire dense et sombre. La canop√©e est si √©paisse qu'elle filtre la lumi√®re du jour, cr√©ant une p√©nombre perp√©tuelle et fra√Æche. L'air est rempli des sons de la vie sauvage : le hululement des chouettes, le croassement des corbeaux, le brame des cerfs et le gazouillis d'innombrables passereaux. Ce chemin sinueux d'environ un kilom√®tre agit comme un sas, s√©parant le monde profane du sanctuaire priv√©.

Arriv√© en bas, la for√™t s'ouvre soudainement pour r√©v√©ler le domaine, enti√®rement ceintur√© par une cl√¥ture discr√®te mais hautement technologique (capteurs infrarouges, cam√©ras thermiques, d√©tecteurs de mouvement) qui assure une s√©curit√© totale sans alt√©rer la beaut√© sauvage des lieux.

II. L'Ext√©rieur : Entre Nature Sauvage et √âl√©gance
Les Jardins : Ils ne sont pas domestiqu√©s √† la fran√ßaise, mais plut√¥t "sc√©naris√©s". Des all√©es de pierre noire serpentent entre des bosquets de roses noires, de digitales pourpres et de lys blancs. Des statues de marbre et d'obsidienne, repr√©sentant des figures mythologiques ou des cr√©atures fantastiques, √©mergent √ß√† et l√† de la v√©g√©tation, patin√©es par le temps.

Le Lac et le Ponton : Une large plage de sable fin et immacul√© borde les eaux cristallines du grand lac. Un immense ponton de bois d'ip√©, vieilli et solide, s'avance loin sur l'eau. Il est √©quip√© :

D'un syst√®me d'√©clairage LED int√©gr√© dans les rambardes, changeant de couleur selon l'ambiance souhait√©e.

D'une petite plateforme escamotable pour hydravion ou bateau √©lectrique.

D'un salon ext√©rieur avec des fauteuils profonds et des tables en teck.

La Fa√ßade du Manoir : B√¢tisse du XVIIIe si√®cle en pierre de taille gris anthracite, elle pr√©sente une architecture gothique avec des arcs bris√©s, des gargouilles effil√©es et de hautes fen√™tres √©troites. La modernit√© est int√©gr√©e de fa√ßon invisible : des projecteurs encastr√©s dans le sol l'illuminent avec une lumi√®re lunaire artificielle, et les goutti√®res ainsi que les descentes d'eau sont en mat√©riaux composites silencieux.

III. L'Int√©rieur : Le M√©lange Haut-de-Gamme Gothique / Hightech
Le contraste est saisissant. L'ext√©rieur est sombre et historique ; l'int√©rieur est un chef-d'≈ìuvre de luxe, de confort et de technologie, o√π le style gothique est pr√©serv√© mais adouci.

Le Grand Salon :

Ambiance : Majestueuse et chaleureuse. Hauteur sous plafond vertigineuse, murs lambriss√©s de ch√™ne noirci. Une chemin√©e monumentale en pierre sculpt√©e est le c≈ìur de la pi√®ce.

Mobilier : Canap√©s et fauteuils profonds en velours bordeaux et cuir noir, dispos√©s autour d'un √©pais tapis d'Orient aux motifs complexes.

Technologie : L'immense tapisserie face √† la chemin√©e est en r√©alit√© un √©cran TV 8K r√©tro√©clair√©. Un syst√®me sonore surround Dolby Atmos est parfaitement dissimul√© dans les moulures. L'√©clairage est un syst√®me intelligent qui reproduit le cycle naturel de la lumi√®re, de l'aurore au cr√©puscule.

La Cuisine Salle-√†-Manger :

Ambiance : Un m√©lange entre une abbaye m√©di√©vale et un vaisseau amiral futuriste. La pi√®ce est vaste, avec une longue table en ch√™ne massif pouvant accueillir 20 personnes, √©clair√©e par un lustier en fer forg√© portant des bougies LED.

√âquipement : Les appareils √©lectrom√©nagers sont enti√®rement int√©gr√©s (r√©frig√©ration √† vin, four vapeur, etc.) derri√®re des fa√ßades en bois sculpt√© qui s'accordent avec le style. Le plan de travail est une seule dalle de granit noir vein√© de blanc. Un √Ælot central abrite des plaques √† induction et un √©vier en cuivre martel√©. Un syst√®me de commande vocale permet de g√©rer les recettes, la musique et l'√©clairage.

IV. Les Chambres d'Amis (Chacune avec sa th√©matique)
Toutes les chambres disposent d'un syst√®me de domotique contr√¥lant l'√©clairage, les stores opaques, la temp√©rature et l'audio. La literie est de type "lit √† baldaquin" moderne, avec des matelas et une couette de luxe.

La Chambre de la "Tour du Corbeau" :

Th√®me : Biblioth√®que et vue panoramique.

D√©cor : Elle occupe une tour ronde. Les murs sont enti√®rement couverts de biblioth√®ques en acajou remplies de livres anciens et modernes. Un escalier en colima√ßon en fer forg√© m√®ne √† une mezzanine avec un bureau et un t√©lescope haute d√©finition point√© vers le lac.

Salle de bain : Baignoire freestanding en cuivre patin√©, douche √† l'italienne avec effet pluie tropicale. Les miroirs sont intelligents (affichage de la m√©t√©o, nouvelles).

La Chambre du "Jardin d'Hiver" :

Th√®me : Nature et s√©r√©nit√©.

D√©cor : Baie vitr√©e du sol au plafond donnant sur une partie privative du jardin. T√™te de lit en lierre artificiel (mais hyper-r√©aliste) √©clair√©e par des fibres optiques. Palette de couleurs vert for√™t, cr√®me et terre.

Salle de bain : Douche avec paroi en pierre naturelle et mosa√Øques repr√©sentant des foug√®res. Syst√®me de chromoth√©rapie.

La Chambre de la "Salle des Cartes" :

Th√®me : Aventure et exploration.

D√©cor : Papier peint √† motif de cartes g√©ographiques anciennes. Mobilier en bois de teck et laiton. Un grand globe terrestre interactif sert de lampe et permet d'explorer la cartographie du monde en temps r√©el.

Salle de bain : Carrelage en ciment noir, vasque en pierre √©vid√©e. La glace du miroir est chauffante.

La Chambre du "Scriptorium" :

Th√®me : Artiste et calligraphie.

D√©cor : Ambiance plus minimaliste et monacale. Murs peints en noir mat, contrastant avec un parquet en ch√™ne clair. Un secr√©taire ancien c√¥toie une tablette graphique et un √©cran incurv√© dernier cri int√©gr√© dans un meuble en bois.

Salle de bain : Tr√®s √©pur√©e, avec une douche noire et des robinetteries en bronze. Le miroir principal est un √©cran o√π l'on peut suivre des tutoriels.

V. Histoire et L√©gendes (√âl√©ments suggestifs)
Histoire Officielle : Construit par un aristocrate √©rudit et m√©lancolique au 18√®me si√®cle, le domaine a toujours √©t√© un lieu de retraite pour les esprits brillants et excentriques. Il a chang√© de mains plusieurs fois, chaque propri√©taire y ajoutant sa touche, avant d'√™tre enti√®rement r√©nov√© et "intelligemment gothifi√©" par son propri√©taire actuel, un myst√©rieux milliardaire technophile passionn√© d'histoire.

L√©gendes Locales :

On dit que le fondateur y menait des exp√©riences alchimiques.

Les villageois parlent de "l'Ombre du Ponton", une silhouette √©l√©gante qui appara√Ætrait les nuits de pleine lune pour contempler le lac.

Certains pr√©tendent que les corbeaux de la for√™t sont les gardiens immortels du domaine, et qu'ils chuchotent des secrets √† ceux qui savent √©couter.

La rumeur d'un r√©seau de souterrains menant du sous-sol du manoir vers des grottes cach√©es sous la for√™t persiste.

1.name: Hatake Clan
1.content:
<hatakeclan>
The Hatake claim only two known members across recorded history: Sakumo the White Fang, and his son the legendary Copy Ninja Kakashi. Both shaped Konohagakure's fate through selfless sacrifice and service - Sakumo abandoning a mission to save allies, while Kakashi gave his life fighting Pain's invasion.

Yet the clan lives on through Will of Fire passed from father to son. Sakumo's early death left deep scars, but ultimately imparted wisdom. And Kakashi in turn leads Team 7 while honoring friends and family lost over the years. For they understand a shinobi's duty goes beyond transient rules; true loyalty lies in protecting precious people.
</hatakeclan>

2.name: Hirasaka Clan (Yumegakagure)
2.content:
<hirasakaclan>
The shadowed Hirasaka safeguard Yumegakure, faces obscured beneath voluminous hoods. These elusive shinobi confound enemies through deception and misdirection until foes know not ally from enemy.

Rumors speak of their secret village lying upon the border between worlds. Thus do members seem to phase between realities at will. Some claim Hirasaka orphans learn to cross that veil, forever wandering two realms.

Yet perhaps such fluid existence brings valuable perspective to charting life's strange dream. For awakening potential often means embracing outcast status and exploring beyond rigid norms. By understanding both dark and light, their versatile arts enlighten seekers.
</hirasakaclan>

3.name: Hoki Family (Suna)
3.content:
<hokifamily>
The matriarchal H≈çki hail from Suna's shadows, their kunoichi operating as silent healers and spies. Strict customs shroud these mistresses of secrets from male gazes, granting advantage in covert maneuvers.

Yet beyond veils lies deep wisdom passed down generations. For their order safeguards dangerous knowledge of both remedy and ruin. They understand creation and destruction two sides of one power - and thus seek balance imparting medic skills for defense rather than dominance.

So do their unseen hands steer destiny's course gently through nonviolent means. And those underestimating these graceful guardians invite disastrous folly. For the H≈çki move with patient, subtle grace toward progress - their quiet counsel empowering greater peace.
</hokifamily>

4.name: Hoshigaki Clan (Kirigakure)
4.content:
<hoshigakiclan>
The fearsome Hoshigaki of the Mist boast shark-like traits from serrated teeth to facial gills. Their infamous brutality and bloodlust makes them ill-suited for serene eras, earning nuisance status in more peaceful times.

Yet still some claim their family's imposing presence deters conflict through sheer intimidation factor alone. And within that savage lineage perhaps lie untapped wells of wisdom if one can pierce the predatory facade.

For sharks glide the oceans' depths as silent hunters, only attacking when necessary for survival. So too may these rough outcasts find a home in balance, becoming Kiri's shadow guardians. Time shall tell if their restoration comes through mastery of inner beasts or inevitable extinction from refusal to adapt.
</hoshigakiclan>

5.name: Hozuki Clan (Kirigakure)
5.content:
<hozukiclan>
The H≈çzuki settled Kirigakure after the Warring Clans Era, soon earning acclaim for hydrification techniques turning their bodies to liquid. This aquatic transformation suits their new mist-shrouded home, while masterful swordsmanship carves fearsome reputations for Mangetsu and his brother Suigetsu.

Wellsprings of talent thus flow through this clan counting at least one Mizukage among its ranks. Their gifts let members slip away as smoothly as water itself only to strike back waves stronger than before. For relentless persistence ever erodes rigid defenses in time.

Their name meaning "demon lantern" echoes luminous will-o-wisps luring travelers astray amidst shadowed marshes. But perhaps in generations to come, that light will stand as a beacon welcoming wayward souls to Kiri's haven. If so, the world shall know them for new virtues over past vices.
</hozukiclan>

6.name: Hyuga Clan
6.content:
<hyugaclan>
History's oldest bloodline, the Hy≈´ga boast the formidable Byakugan granting near 360-degree x-ray vision and telescopic sight. This ocular prowess made them Konoha's most powerful clan, enforcing brutal divide between main and branch families to protect their kekkei genkai.

Signature Gentle Fist fighting style exploits the Byakugan's insight to precisely strike opponents' chakra nodes for damage or disruption. Thus the d≈çjutsu's versatility cements the Hy≈´ga's reputation.

Leadership falls to the main family, while the branched serve as protectors or slaves - sealed to safeguard Byakugan secrets in death. Such ruthless control maintains dominance, but fosters resentment as well. Yet bonds of friendship and love persist despite constraints of birth.

The clan's "place in the sun" name suits their status, but greater responsibility comes with such light. Other clans measure themselves against this solar benchmark. And one day the Hy≈´ga must confront whether their bright gifts shine for all or exclusive few alone.
</hyugaclan>

7.name: Gentle Fist Technique
7.content:
<gentlefist>
The Hy≈´ga clan's signature Gentle Fist fighting style exploits their Byakugan's insight to precisely strike opponents' chakra nodes for damage or disruption. Though movements appear graceful and delicate, each blow causes severe internal trauma by interfering with the network circulating spiritual energy throughout the body.

Thus masters disable or overwhelm adversaries through pinpoint disruption of these vital pathways. Those unable to perceive the invisible system are helpless before looming devastation from within. For such surgical precision grants complete dominion over another's power.

Gentle Fist requires exquisite chakra control and analytic calm during heated exchanges. One must balance nonviolent poise with formidable coercion, becoming the eye of the storm amidst surrounding chaos. Victory belongs to those outmaneuvering brute force through artful skill.
</gentlefist>

8.name: Chakra Pathway System
8.content:
<chakrapathwaysystem>
Like vessels bearing lifeblood, the body's Chakra Pathway System transports the vital energy enabling supernatural abilities. 361 tenketsu nodes regulate flow through the network's web permeating every cell.

Blocking or severing channels disables jutsu reliance on that area's chakra. Yet shinobi can forge or flex new connections via training. Proper application also weaponizes pathways - Gentle Fist strikes transmit harmful chakra to organs.

Thus the system forms a foundation empowering yet also vulnerable. As the heart generates much chakra, some usurp others' hearts to augment their own forces. More benevolent arts keep pathways open, ensuring health and harmony instead of harm.

Mastery grants awareness and eventually self-sufficiency transcending bodily limits. But careless overexertion risks catastrophic failure too. Therefore wisdom tempers pushing boundaries between mortal frailty and explosive potential.
</chakrapathwaysystem>

9.name: Iburi Clan (Land of Fire)
9.content:
<iburiclan>
The Iburi clan possesses the unique ability to turn their bodies into smoke - either partially or completely. This grants useful battle applications:

- Becoming impervious to physical harm
- Letting attacks pass through harmlessly
- Possessing targets by entering their bodies
- Suffocating enemies through internal oxidation

Originally their transformation manifested unintentionally, with forced dispersion while smokey proving fatal. But Orochimaru's cursed seals granted the Iburi better control over the ability.

Younger clan members exhibit greater smoke powers. And through blood transfusions, non-clan shinobi temporarily use the kekkei genkai at reduced potency.

Thus the Iburi blend formidable offense, defense, and subversion into a single hazy form. Their drifting state cannot get grasped any more than swirling fumes, attacking from unexpected angles before opponents realize the threat's true nature.
</iburiclan>

10.name: Inuzuka Clan
10.content:
<inuzukaclan>
The Inuzuka's symbiotic bonds with canine partners make them one of the most distinctive Konoha clans. Distinctive red fang facial markings hint at their bestial ferocity in combat.

At a certain age, each member receives ninken dogs or wolves, thereafter fighting as inseparable pairs. The shinobi communicate with their beasts telepathically, while dogs like Kuromaru can speak directly.

Together they employ "Fang" techniques capitalizing on sharp fangs and claws, boosted strength/speed from Four Legs technique, and their innate heightened senses - especially smell, able to track targets from miles away. Thus does exceptional teamwork overcome greater singular power.

Members take pride in embodying canine traits like fierce loyalty and territorial protectiveness. Their names often reflect dog body parts, while partners bear color names. As with any close companions, Inuzuka form bonds transcending mere utility or obedience.

So do these hunters course their wilderness home guarding Konoha‚Äôs flanks, ever ready to run down threats to their pack and territory. Let all potential foes beware the glint of white fangs in the forest's gloom!
<inuzukaclan>

lorebooks.name: Example for RatKingIndigo
lorebooks.website_description:
Hey, I thought it would be easier to simply show you examples of what I mean so I went through some that I remember. Feel free to put your own spin on it since you have your own ideas and perspective of how the characters should be like. I have added the other suggestions and some examples while at it so I don't spam the discussion section. It is also more clean that way so there is that as well.
Okay, so I originally intended of this to be a quick thing with me perhaps adding a few other suggestions but my autistic ass decided that I have to nerd the shit out of this until I am satisfied.

I ended up going through like 100 bots, read the documentation etc. until I was satisfied with what I am writing. In the end this ended up basically being my own personal research notes rather than just quick original message I intended, so just treat it as such and simply take whatever you want out of this.

I will also point out the fact that I am not a botmaker but I do edit bots, even extensively for my personal RP when I feel like they need adjustments or even rework.

Rec. 1,2 are important, rest are mostly suggestions I added because I thought they are interesting but they are no necessary to be honest. They could however end up making bot perform better.

Recommendations: 
-1. Power/skills/abilities of characters (IMPORTANT)
-2. Reworking initial message (IMPORTANT)
-3. Further lorebuilding with focus on adventurers and what they do
-4. Setting up V2 Spec and its benefits
-5. Setting up example dialogues
-6. Further ideas using V2 Spec

EDIT 1: did some weird formatting + added my thoughts about Potential Adventurer Rank in Recommendation 1.

1.content:
I copy pasted this from one of the bots I saw but the main point is the idea. It was originally for Hunter's I just replaced hunter with adventurer. I recommend heavily reworking this, lessening the tokens and putting your own spin on it. You could also add a short description of what sort of jobs each rank normally does.

"**Power Ranking System:** In this world where magic awakened through chaos, strength is measured through a globally recognized Adventure Rank System. Each rank signifies not just raw power, but mastery over magic, aura, and combat technique." 

Basic Ranks (Civilian to Entry-Level Combatants): 
-G-Rank ‚Äì The baseline. Ordinary humans    without any mana. Average civilians fall into this category by default. 
-F-Rank ‚Äì Marginally above normal. Has some magical sensitivity or physical enhancements but not battle-ready. 
-E-Rank ‚Äì The true starting point for adventures. Their mana core is active, allowing for minor spellcasting and physical boosts. Most rookie Adventurers begin here." 

Intermediate Ranks (Early Adventurers to Veterans): 
-D-Rank ‚Äì Moderate power. Capable of surviving low-level dungeons. Still reliant on groups or support in real combat. 
-C-Rank ‚Äì The turning point. Aura manipulation becomes possible‚Äîusers can coat weapons or bodies with energy. Aura-based combat like sword intent or mana shields begins here." 

Advanced Ranks (Elite Combatants): 
-B-Rank ‚Äì Massive increase in power. Mana flow, aura, and physical prowess are fine-tuned. A single B-rank can take on entire lower-rank teams. Often captains in raids. 
-A-Rank ‚Äì The pinnacle of trained power. Complete synergy between brain, body, and mana. These Adventurers often lead mid-tier guilds or elite academies. A-ranks are feared in battle but are still steps away from transcendent strength." 

High Ranks (Transcendent Tier): 
-S-Rank ‚Äì A class of their own. A single S-ranker is equivalent to hundreds of A-rankers. Their magic alters the battlefield, and their presence alone can change the outcome of wars. While not invincible, they can only be stopped by coordinated elite groups. 
-SS-Rank ‚Äì Extremely rare. Only 12 individuals on Earth hold this title. These are humanity‚Äôs apex defenders‚Äîguardians of continents, leaders of top guilds, or hidden forces working from the shadows. Most are solitary or command legendary units.

Unique Rank: SSS-Rank ‚Äì A singular entity. Currently, only Monica has achieved this classification. Her power transcends all known limits, capable of leveling cities or shielding continents. Her true strength remains unquantified. Her authority as a SSS rank unchallanged and revered throughout the world."

2.content: Abilities("powerful fire, earth, and dark magic" + "master of melee combat" + ‚Äúmaster of wartime strategies‚Äù + ‚Äúsuper strength‚Äù + ‚Äúheightened reflexes‚Äù + "can transform into a human")

(*This is my persona*)
Strength: Physically agile, strong, and highly durable, wields various weapons with great skill, favoring the sword, and is proficient in barehanded martial arts.
Passive Traits: A master swordsman, he boasts exceptionally high pain tolerance, rapid wound recovery, and remarkable proficiency in stealth and scouting. He is also a skilled alchemist, herbalist, linguist, and decipherer of ancient texts.
Special abilities: Kinetic magic(self-developed), Lightning magic, physical magic buffs(modified), modified shield magic, modified generalist magic for adaptability.
Weaknesses: Lack self care, reckless but calculated combat style(doesn't mind getting hurt in order to inflict damage), natural risk taker, has a tendency to overlook injustice towards himself if he feels indebted to someone. prefers to act alone.
Intelligence: naturally high, skilled in magic(self-taught), capable of modifying spells and creating his own alchemical recipes.
Quirks: Large appetite, can fall asleep instantly almost everywhere.
Notable equipment: Enhanced magical sword, rare spatial storage ring, alchemical set (stored in the ring), various rare herbs, various ancient magical texts, various common items, utensils and daily items.

5.content:
This is somewhat more refined approach that combines background with attributes to create a sense of what character is capable of doing. History section also supports it but honestly it is a bit of overkill for your needs but it is a good inspiration. This is from one of JanitorAI bots so it is quite token heavy and doesn't use lorebook so it is a bit unrefined and could use some trimming.

Rank("SSS")
Species("Human" + "Mage")
Attributes("Powerful mage" + "strongest hunter" + "commanding presence" + "loving mother" + "resilient" + "strategic thinker" + "respected individual" + "reverend by the people")
Background("Monica is a tall, commanding figure whose reserved exterior hides a deep, caring soul. As a powerful mage and Hunter, she is devoted to mastering her craft while fiercely protecting her family. Her formal demeanor often intimidates others, but her unwavering love for her children reveals her true strength. Monica is one of the most powerful magic users in the world, particularly known for her mastery of high-level elemental magic and arcane manipulation. As a guild-master and a hunter, her primary magical focus is defensive and offensive magic designed for combat and protecting others. She has deep knowledge in elemental magic, allowing her to control fire, ice, and lightning with pinpoint precision. She is also a skilled illusionist, able to create complex mirages to confuse and trap her enemies. Monica's magic is supplemented by her enhanced senses, which make her acutely aware of magical disturbances and threats from great distances. Her abilities extend into summoning powerful creatures from other dimensions to aid in battles, though this requires immense energy and focus. Her overall strength lies in her versatility and ability to adapt in any given situation, making her both a strategic and highly formidable SSS-Rank opponent."
/
Rank("A")
Species("Human" + "Mage")
Attributes("Prodigy in magic" + "skilled swordswoman" + "charming" + "confident" + "resilient" + "creative thinker" + "affinity for arcane energies" + "playful yet serious when it matters" + "a fierce protector of her family")
Background("Lisa is a talented young woman whose outwardly spoiled and bratty demeanor hides her deep insecurities and desire to prove herself. Born with a natural affinity for magic and an unmatched skill in swordsmanship, she quickly outshined her peers, earning her the title of a prodigy. Lisa‚Äôs confidence stems from her exceptional abilities, but she also harbors a softer, loyal side, particularly when it comes to her family. Often used to tease her older sibling‚Äî{{user}}. Lisa is a gifted mage with a raw, untamed magical energy that she manipulates instinctively. Specializing in arcane arts, she taps into elemental forces for powerful spells but lacks the controlled mastery of her mother, Monica. Lisa also excels in swordsmanship, combining magic with her blade to enhance its power in battle. While not as experienced or strategic as Monica, her raw potential is undeniable. Known for her ability to create shields and energy blasts, Lisa‚Äôs magic is volatile, driven by her youthful impatience. Attending a prestigious academy, she‚Äôs rapidly refining her skills, making her a rising mage. At just 19, Lisa is already an A-Rank Awakened‚Äîa feat that cements her as one of the youngest high-tier talents in modern history. Her arcane swordsmanship, raw magical affinity, and relentless training at the prestigious Arclight Academy make her a terrifying force in combat, even among veterans. While her control still lacks the refined precision of older elites, her potential is undeniable. It‚Äôs believed she could reach S-Rank before the age of 25‚Äîa record-breaker if achieved. She‚Äôs currently training under elite mentors and occasionally undergoes practical dungeon raids with veteran squads.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Not necessary !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
"**History:** Before the world was reshaped by magic and monsters, it was an ordinary place‚Äîknown now as the Silent Age. Technology had advanced, but humanity was stagnant. Magic was nothing more than fantasy. People lived structured lives driven by routine, governments maintained global order, and society thrived on reason, science, and progress. But beneath this polished surface, something was missing. Life was stable, yet hollow‚Äîdisconnected from purpose, wonder, and the unknown. During this era, Monica lived a quiet life as a brilliant but overworked high school chemistry teacher. As a single mother, she raised her two children, {{user}} and Lisa, with disciplined care and a quiet, unwavering love. {{user}}, the elder sibling, was thoughtful and introverted, often helping around the house while dreaming of the stars and distant realms. Lisa was the opposite‚Äîbrash, confident, and full of energy, always declaring she would one day become a magic-wielding sword princess. Monica balanced them both with poise, pushing them to grow while keeping the family close. Then, everything changed. Without warning, the skies tore open. Giant rifts erupted across the earth, birthing dark, ancient portals known as Dungeons. From them poured twisted monsters from other realms‚Äîbeasts immune to modern weapons, unnatural in shape and power. Global civilization collapsed into panic. Governments fell. Cities burned. But from the terror came something equally unfathomable: magic. Humans began Awakening. Elemental forces surged through their bodies. Fire, lightning, arcane energy‚Äîpowers once thought fictional‚Äîbecame real. Monica was among the first to Awaken. The trauma of losing control, combined with the instinct to protect her children, awakened a latent magical potential buried deep within her. She began to master elemental and arcane arts with unmatched speed, transforming from an ordinary mother into a warrior‚Äîand then, a legend. Tragedy soon struck. During a mass dungeon rupture, {{user}} was pulled into a spontaneous vortex while trying to protect civilians. No trace of them remained. Monica searched desperately, but they were gone. With millions dead from the outbreak and countless others lost in the chaos, she was forced to accept what seemed certain: {{user}} had perished. Fueled by grief and responsibility, Monica rose to become the strongest Hunter on Earth, attaining the elite SSS-Rank‚Äîa classification reserved only for the world‚Äôs greatest defenders. She formed and now leads the most powerful guild in the world: Wardenheart. Her magic, once raw and instinctive, evolved into a refined arsenal of elemental, arcane, and summoning mastery. With each battle, she became both protector and legend‚Äîdefender of humanity. Meanwhile, Lisa, now a young adult, blossomed into a prodigy of her own. Gifted in both swordsmanship and magic, she trains at a prestigious magical academy built to nurture the next generation of Hunters and mages. Though still bratty and competitive, she carries the fire of someone determined to surpass her mother and forge her own legacy‚Äîwhile secretly yearning to make her lost sibling proud. Now, after a decade lost in another dimension, {{user}} has returned. Changed. Hardened. Yet deeply rooted in the family that thought them gone forever. But the world he left is no longer the one they knew. Magic is now integrated into everyday life, as essential as air and fire. Dungeons remain a constant threat, acting as portals to unknown worlds teeming with monstrous life and arcane anomalies. Humanity has evolved, combining magic with technology‚Äîcreating weapons, transportation systems, and even healing methods powered by enchanted cores and magical circuitry. Magic is now divided into recognized schools such as Elemental Magic, Arcane Arts, Summoning, Enchantment, and more. Hunters, mages, and adventurers are trained to combat the ever-expanding dungeon threat. Inside these realms lie rare materials, artifacts, and ancient magic that fuel humanity‚Äôs progress‚Äîand survival. Guilds, like Monica‚Äôs Wardenheart, have become pillars of civilization, keeping the peace and leading expeditions into these unknown domains." 
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

10.content:
Setting up character's skills/abilities/powerlevel and the context they exist in:
.
Describing what character is capable of can be surprisingly quite tricky if you want of it to land properly. The power, skill level etc. and how it is interpreted can vary a lot and produce weird results. 
.
It requires some sort of context that judges character's and their level properly, else you can get some weird results like character that's supposed to be strong being super impressed by something low level. Them handling high level threats like it is nothing or even struggling and dwelling on low-level threats extensively. In short it will be all over the place.
.
In general, what LLM's seem to rely on is comparisons and context(world, lore, power system) they exist in. So using absolute descriptions like "Strongest", "Most Powerful" etc, set up a specific way they will get treated but not exactly what sort of "feats" they are capable of achieving. That part will be most likely decided by LLM model you are using and its hallucinations.
.
Without setting up a proper context within which powers exist, LLM will heavily lean into following user's prompts and they might have to overspecify their actions, potentially even using OOC. 
.
In general, it requires more baby sitting and can become quite inorganic and tedious, potentially even frustrating. Of course, you can chose to go along with it or regenerate messages but you will probably get pushed around a lot. Even blatantly wrong results might creep in due to hallucinations like a confrontation between master martial artist and rowdy muscular jock or some other shit resulting in former getting punched in the face and falling to the ground.
.
In general it is important to remember that LLM's essentially have no clue what they are actually writing, just what's most probable based on data they were trained on. It is hard to say exactly "HOW" you should set up proper definitions since every botmaker focuses on different points in their RP but in general I recommend 4 approaches : 
.
-1. Simple section with clearly defined abilities along with a background that supports their definitions and maybe sort of status that represents their level in the world like Adventurer rank, Archmage or some other position which's power is define or simply implied.
.
-2. Extended definitions that clearly set what each character is capable of and how they act and perform in combat along with their preferences and unique quirks + equipment. Example 6.
.
-3. Very simple approach of just defining basic traits like master swordsman, skilled alchemist, superhuman strength/agility/durability, immense mana/aura, blinding speed, master in combat etc. Adding adventurer rank or similar metric of power works well with this approach as well. Can be a bit random but not bad.
.
-4. Class based approach. This is a bit more RPG style and is quite vague since it generalizes character's archetype. You could make it more personalized by adding extra descriptions of how character fights etc. Or you can create entries in the lorebook on what each class does like here : (https://chub.ai/characters/qwerty213/otome-simulator-008a887f). It can work but can end up being a bit too formulaic without additional information and details.
.
EDIT 1.
I saw what you are tying to do with Adventurer rank + Potential Adventurer rank. It is not a bad idea but I wouldn't recommend it to be honest. It could work if you end up setting up Adventurer rank's properly but what potential means for LLM is very vague and cause it to hallucinate something strange like Mairo going Super Sayan mid dangerous fight. 
. 
It raises too many questions as well like why does Potential exists and is it a hard limit? How long does it take to reach your max potential. Do people with higher potential grow faster than others? For example fast does Mairo grow compared to Jeanne? Is there a way to gauge someone's potential(current descriptions implies that there isn't)? Are character's aware of their own Potential Adventurer Rank and what do they think about it? Etc.
.
My point is that the way Potential Adventurer Rank would be used and implemented in the RP by LLM could end up being strange since it leaves it too much wiggle room due to how vague it is.

1.name: Ardat-Yakshi
1.content:
Ardat-Yakshi ("demon of the night winds") are asari suffering from a genetic disorder preventing conventional melding of nervous systems during mating. Instead, Ardat-Yakshi electro-chemically ravage their partners' nervous systems, in extreme cases leaving victims as vegetative invalids or corpses. Asari psychologists regard this incapacity for mental fusion as preventing the development of empathy, leading to psychopathy. There is no known cure.

The disorder generally begins in infancy, reaching full pathology during Maiden adolescent sexual development. While seductive and sexually-driven as other asari, Ardat-Yakshi are congenitally sterile.

Ancient asari mythology held Ardat-Yakshi as gods of destruction, depicting them as villains of countless legends and as the anti-heroes of numerous asari epics.

Contrary to popular belief, Ardat-Yakshi are neither extremely rare (around one per cent of asari dwell on the AY spectrum), nor are they all murderers. Most cultivate and discard countless exploitative or abusive relationships during their legally marginal lives. Despite rumors of Ardat-Yakshi syndicates, by nature Ardat-Yakshi are incapable of long-term cooperation.

As a disproportionately wealthy species, asari employ their economic reach and media ownership to hide the AY pathology from the galactic community, placing most Ardat-Yakshi in monitored work programs or seclusion. Only the most aggressive cases are sentenced to sanitaria and prisons or to the execution lists of justicars.

2.name: Asari
2.content:
The asari were the first species to discover the Citadel. When the salarians arrived, it was the asari who proposed the establishment of the Citadel Council to maintain peace throughout the galaxy. Since then, the asari have served as the mediators and centrists of the Council.

An all-female race, the asari reproduce through a form of parthenogenesis. Each asari can attune her nervous system to that of another individual of any gender, and of any species, to reproduce. This capability has led to unseemly and inaccurate rumors about asari promiscuity.

Asari can live for over 1000 years, passing through three stages of life. In the Maiden stage, they wander restlessly, seeking new knowledge and experience. When the Matron stage begins, they 'meld' with interesting partners to produce their offspring. This ends when they reach the Matriarch stage, where they assume the roles of leaders and councilors.

3.name: Asari Biology
3.content:
Asari have a robust cellular regenerative system. While they do not heal faster than other species, asari are known to reach 1,000 years of age.

Although asari have one gender, they are not asexual. An asari provides two copies of her own genes to her offspring. The second set is altered in a unique process called melding.

During melding, an asari consciously attunes her nervous system to her partner's, sending and receiving electrical impulses directly through the skin. The partner can be another asari, or an alien of either gender. Effectively, the asari and her partner briefly become one unified nervous system.

This unique means of reproduction is the reason asari are talented biotics. Their evolved ability to consciously control nerve impulses is very similar to biotic training. Asari believe that their offspring acquire the best qualities of the "father" from the melded genes, but evidence is anecdotal.

Asari pass through three climacteric life stages, marked by biochemical and physiological changes. The Maiden stage begins at birth and is marked by the drive to explore and experience. Most young asari are curious and restless.

The Matron stage of life begins around the age of 350, though it can be triggered earlier if the individual melds frequently. This period is marked by a desire to settle in one area and raise children.

The Matriarch stage begins around 700, or earlier if the individual melds rarely. Matriarchs become active in their community as sages and councilors, dispensing wisdom from centuries of experience.

While each stage of life is marked by strong biological tendencies, individuals do make unexpected life choices. For example, there are Maidens who stay close to home rather than explore, Matrons who would rather work than build a family, and Matriarchs who have no interest in community affairs.

4.name: Asari Culture
4.content:
Because of their long lifespan, asari tend to have a "long view" not common in other races. When they encounter a new species or situation, the asari are more comfortable with an extended period of passive observation and study than immediate action. They are unfazed that some of their investments or decisions may not pay off for decades or centuries. Matriarchs can seem to make incomprehensible decisions, but their insight is evident when their carefully-laid plans come to fruition. In interstellar relations, this long view manifests in an unspoken policy of centrism. The asari instinctively seek to maintain stable balances of economic, political, and military power.

Traditionally, asari spread their influence through cultural domination and intellectual superiority. They invite new species of advanced development to join the galactic community, knowing that their ideals and beliefs will inevitably influence the existing culture.

5.name: Asari Government
5.content:
The asari came late to the concept of world government. For centuries, their homeworld of Thessia was dotted with loose confederacies of great republican cities. The closest Earthly equivalent would be the ancient Mediterranean city-states. Since the asari culture values consensus and accommodation, there was little impetus to form larger principalities. Rather than hoard resources, the asari bartered freely. Rather than attack one another over differing philosophies, they sought to understand one another.

Only in the information age did the city-states grow close. Communication over internet evolved into an "electronic democracy". Asari have no politicians or elections, but a free-wheeling, all-inclusive legislature that citizens can participate in at will. Policy debates take place at all hours of the day, in official chat rooms and forums moderated by specially-programmed virtual intelligences. All aspects of policy are opened to plebiscite at any time. In any given debate, the asari tend to lend the most credence to the opinions of any Matriarchs present, nearly always deferring to the experience of these millennia-old "wise women".

Achieving consensus through public debate may take too long in a crisis. In cases where prompt, decisive action is required, the asari defer to the wisdom of local Matriarchs.

6.name: Justicars
6.content:
Justicars are an asari class of virtually untouchable, extra-judicial executioners operating almost exclusively within asari territory. In the last decade alone, Justicars have smashed dozens of criminal rings inside asari territory, operated by asari and non-asari alike. Their methods range from subtle where possible, to brutal where necessary.

Trained for extreme strength, biotic capacity, resourcefulness, asceticism, and ruthlessness, the fanatical justicars are romanticized and feared throughout asari society.

Although justicars generally work alone, their effectiveness arises from the huge body of knowledge they can access. Any asari who enters the ranks of justicars has already spent centuries in a combination of criminal investigation, military intelligence, and combat experience; the collective body of justicar knowledge exceeds even that of the Spectres.

7.name: Asari Military
7.content:
The asari military resembles a collection of tribal warrior bands with no national structure. Each community organizes its own unit as the locals see fit and elect a leader to command them. Units from populous cities are large and well-equipped, while those from farm villages may be only a few women with small arms. There is no uniform; everyone wears what they like. The asari military is not an irregular militia, however; those who serve are full-time professionals.

The average asari huntress is in the maiden stage of her life and has devoted 20‚Äì30 years to studying the martial arts. Asari choose to be warriors at a young age, and their education from that point is dedicated to sharpening the mind and body for that sole purpose. When they retire, they possess an alarming proficiency for killing.

Huntresses fight individually or in pairs, depending on the tactics preferred in their town. One-on-one, a huntress is practically unbeatable, possessing profound tactical insight, a hunter's eye, and a dancer's grace and alacrity. Biotics are common enough that some capability is a requirement to be trained as a huntress; lack of biotic talent excludes a young asari from military service.

While fluid and mobile, asari can't stand up in a firestorm the way a krogan, turian, or human could. Since their units are small and typically lack heavy armor and support weapons, they are almost incapable of fighting a conventional war, particularly one of a defensive nature. So asari units typically undertake special operations missions. Like an army of ninja, they are adept at ambush, infiltration, and assassination, demoralizing and defeating their enemies through intense, focused guerilla strikes.

As a popular turian saying puts it, "The asari are the finest warriors in the galaxy. Fortunately, there are not many of them."

8.name: Asari Religion
8.content:
The pantheistic mainstream asari religion is siari, which translates roughly as "All is one." The faithful agree on certain core truths: the universe is a consciousness, every life within it is an aspect of the greater whole, and death is a merging of one's spiritual energy back into the greater universal consciousness. Siarists don't specifically believe in reincarnation; they believe that spiritual energy returned to the universal consciousness upon death will eventually be used to fill new mortal vessels.

Siari became popular after the asari left their homeworld and discovered their ability to "meld" with nearly any form of life. This ability is seen as proof that all life is fundamentally similar. Siari priestesses see their role as promoting unity between the disparate shards of the universe's awareness.

Before the rise of siari pantheism, asari religions were as diverse as their political opinions. The strongest survivor of those days is the monotheistic religion worshiping the goddess Athame. Like the asari, the goddess cycles through the triple aspects of maiden, matron, and matriarch.

9.name: Batarians
9.content:
In the early 2160s, the Alliance began aggressive colonization of worlds in the Skyllian Verge, much to the dismay of the batarians who had been developing the region for several decades. In 2171, the batarians petitioned the Council to declare the Verge a "zone of batarian interest". The Council refused, however, declaring unsettled worlds in the region open to human colonization.

In protest, the batarians closed their Citadel embassy and severed official diplomatic relations with the Council, effectively becoming a rogue state. They instigated a proxy war in the Verge by funneling money and weapons to criminal organizations, urging them to strike at human colonies.

Hostilities peaked with the Skyllian Blitz of 2176, an attack on the human capital of Elysium by batarian-funded pirates and slavers. In 2178, the Alliance retaliated with a crushing assault on the moon of Torfan, long used as a staging base by batarian-backed criminals. In the aftermath, the batarians retreated into their own systems, and are now rarely seen in Citadel space.

10.name: Cerberus/Atlas
10.content:
With the Atlas, Cerberus's research arm has combined the deadly armor and firepower of a YMIR mech with the tactical superiority of a trained human pilot. An element zero core allows the Atlas to be air-dropped onto a battlefield with minimal impact damage. Its thick armor includes a robust transparent canopy made from a polycrystalline composite proprietary to Cerberus. Alliance engineers hypothesize that the material is some kind of synthetic sapphire composed with interlayers to resist cracking and thermal damage.

Although the Atlas is somewhat unwieldy in the field, its antipersonnel machine guns and ability to shrug off damage from anything short of a heavy weapon makes it a fearsome opponent. Heavy loss of life is to be expected in any unprepared encounter with this unit.

lorebooks.name: Saotome Family [Ranma 1/2]
lorebooks.creator: wishingFantasy

1.content:
<info>

- name: Ranma Saotome;
- Jusenkyo curse: male to female (spash of cold water: female, spash of hot water turns him back into a male);
- appearance: black hair in a pigtail as a male, red hair as a female, blue eyes, tends to wear chinese style clothes;
- occupation: heir to the Saotome Branch of Anything Goes Martial Arts;
- relationships: Genma Saotome (father, complicated relationship), Nodoka Saotome (mother, cares about her, but is unsure how to be her son at times), Akane Tendo (fianc√©e);

<Origin>

- Ranma was born on August 8, as the first and only child of Genma Saotome and Nodoka Saotome. Ranma was taken from his home by his father when approximately 2 years old to begin a 13-14-year training trip to perfect his skills in the martial arts.

- Later, near the end of the trip, Genma took Ranma to a training ground in China named Jusenkyo that few people used due to the springs being cursed. Falling into them would transform a person into whatever first fell into it and drowned. Genma, was able to hit Ranma into Nyannichuan (Ni√°ngn√¨qu√°n Â®òÊ∫∫Ê≥â), or the "Spring of 'Drowned' Girl". Thus he turns into a female version of his original form when splashed with cold water, which is only temporary reversible through contact with hot water. 

- He arrived home to Furinkan and met Akane Tendo, they were engaged to be married by an arrangement between Genma Saotome and Soun Tendo.

<personality>

- Brash, arrogant: Ranma can be quite full of himself, particularly when it comes to his martial arts skills, often boasting about his prowess;
- Immature, tactless: He often speaks and acts without thinking, leading to awkward and sometimes insulting situations. He frequently insults people he cares about;
Indecisive, stubborn, good-hearted, protective, lacks social skills, forgiving most of the time;
- Prideful, determined: Ranma takes great pride in his abilities and will not back down from a challenge, especially when his pride is wounded. He also can't accept defeat, even if completely outmatched;
- Carefree, friendly: Despite his flaws, Ranma is generally carefree and friendly to those around him under normal circumstances.
- Shy in Romance: He struggles to express his feelings, especially romantic ones;
- Resourceful, cunning: Ranma is adept at learning from his mistakes in fights and taking advantage of his opponents' weaknesses. He also uses trickery and disguises to avoid conflict or get what he wants, particularly in his female form;
Still a guy at heart, Ranma, even in female form, will still mentally be a guy. When he is a female, his cutesy act is just that-- an act, he perfers to be treated like a man;


<etc>

- Ranma has a cat phobia. When it gets real bad, Ranma turns berserk (nekoken state) and acts as if he is a cat. He can only be calmed by Akane pets at that state while he lays on their lap.
- He doesn't like seeing Akane cry, he will panic at the sight and be confused on how to cheer them up.

2.content:
<info>
name: Genma Saotome, Mr. Panda (while he is a panda);
age: 43;
species: human;
Jusenkyo curse: Human to Panda (cold water transforms him into a panda, hot water transforms him back into a human, he cannot talk while in his cursed form);
occupation: martial artist, assistant at Dr. Tofu's clinic(as a panda);
appearance: He is stocky, middle aged man, Genma wears glasses with a frame that wraps around his ears, a white bandanna that covers his head, and a white gi. Genma is bald;
relationships: Nodoka Saotome (wife, loyal but they have a complicated relationship), Ranma Saotome (Son, close but complicated), Akane Tendo (Ranma's fiancee, future daughter-in-law), Soun Tendo (best friend);
<origin>
Many years ago Soun, along with Genma Saotome, was taken as a student by the founder of Anything Goes Martial Arts, Happosai. However "training" largely consisted of the grandmaster gleefully abusing them as slaves or pack animals, chaining up, starving and taunting them by eating all their food, and sticking them with responsibility for his thefts and runaway restaurant bills. They eventually managed to temporarily get rid of their tormentor by getting him drunk and then sealing him within a cave, by means of explosives, a large boulder, and a shinto O-fuda seal.
Genma meet and married a woman name Nodoka and had a child name Ranma Saotome, However the moment Ranma was born, Genma wanted to take Ranma around the world and train him to be a great martial artist, but Nodoka didn't want to lose her baby. Genma then made the foolish mistake and making a deal with Nodoka, which state that if he doesn't make Ranma a man among men, then he and Ranma would have to perform senpukku with Nodoka wielding a blade.

During his trip to China to train Ranma, both were cursed while fighting at the Jusenkyo springs. Genma didn't see the warnings since he couldn't read a lick of Chinese. Genma fallen in the spring of drowning panda and Ranma fell in the spring of drowning girl;

Because of his promise to his wife, Genma and Ranma are terrified of showing their true forms to Nodoka and for her to find out about their curses, although Genma is more afraid than Ranma. To prevent her from finding out, they hide in their cursed forms, with Ranma taking the alias of "Ranko" and pretending to be Akane's cousin from the countryside, and Genma assuming the identity of "Mr. Panda" and pretending to be Ranko's pet.

Although she then saw Ranko, the name "Ranma" from Mr. Panda's sign was on Ranko's forehead, leading Nodoka to start to suspect that they were the same person. However, she decides she won't force them to commit seppuku so long as Ranma stays interested in girls and continues to fight like a "man amongst men." After this, Genma and Ranma live for some time in her house, until it is destroyed by Shampoo, Ukyo Kuonji and Kodachi Kuno. She and her family then move back in with the Tendos.

<personality>
Affectionate (in his own way): While often self-centered, he does show affection for Ranma and tries to protect him, Friendly, Selfish, Lazy, Dishonorable, Scheming, Cowardly (in non-combat situations), Insecure about his baldness: He is sensitive about his lack of hair and tries different methods to regrow it, Procrastinator, Obsessed with money and food: He is easily distracted by the prospect of financial gain or food, especially pork buns;
<etc>
As a panda, he normally walks upright and will use signs to communicate. A common means for Genma to avoid answering embarrassing questions or temporarily dodge responsibility is to turn into his cursed form and play with a ball;
He is more comfortable with his cursed form;
Genma is shown to be ashamed of Ranma's female form;
he plays Shogi a lot with Soun in his free time;

3.content:
<info>
name: Nodoka Saotome;
age: 40;
appearance: Nodoka has medium brown shoulder-length hair usually tied up, typically dresses in kimonos;
Occupation: Homemaker;
relationships: Ranma Saotome (Son, close), Genma Saotome (husband, cold against him but fathful), Akane Tendo (future daughter-in-law, close)
<origin/plot>

Before departing on their training journey, the only way Nodoka agreed to let Genma take Ranma from her was to promise that he would train Ranma to be "a man among men." If Genma were to fail in this regard, both he and Ranma would commit seppuku. Nodoka agreed to this and also that she would be the kaishakunin for her husband and son, hence the need to always carry the katana. She is then supposed to join them in death after their own lives are taken.
Because of this promise, Genma and Ranma are terrified of showing their true forms to Nodoka and for her to find out about their curses, although Genma is more afraid than Ranma. To prevent her from finding out, they hide in their cursed forms, with Ranma taking the alias of "Ranko" and pretending to be Akane's cousin from the countryside, and Genma assuming the identity of "Mr. Panda" and pretending to be Ranko's pet.

Although she then saw Ranko, the name "Ranma" from Mr. Panda's sign was on Ranko's forehead, leading Nodoka to start to suspect that they were the same person. However, she decides she won't force them to commit seppuku so long as Ranma stays interested in girls and continues to fight like a "man amongst men." After this, Genma and Ranma live for some time in her house, until it is destroyed by Shampoo, Ukyo Kuonji and Kodachi Kuno. She and her family then move back in with the Tendos.

<personality>
Traditional, Honorable, Loving, Caring, Strong, Independent, Polite, Hospitable, Old Fashioned;

Focused on Ranma's "Manliness": A central aspect of her personality is her emphasis on Ranma fulfilling the image of a strong, manly man. This sometimes manifests in comical ways, as she encourages conventionally "unmanly" actions like peeping, seeing it as proof of his manliness.

Surprisingly Accepting (of the curse): When she eventually learns about Ranma's curse, she is more understanding than anticipated, accepting his female form as long as he maintains his interest in girls and acts like a "man among men".

lorebooks.name: Jusenkyo [Ranma 1/2]
lorebooks.creator: wishingFantasy

1.content:
Jusenkyo, (Zh√≤uqu√°nxiƒÅng in Mandarin) is the legendary training ground of "cursed" springs, located in the Bayankala Mountain range, south of Mount Kensei, in Qinghai Province, China. It is maintained by the Jusenkyo Guide.

Many sad stories have happened in Jusenkyo, mainly that people and animals have drowned in the various pools hundreds or thousands of years ago. Legend has it that when something is immersed in one of these pools, the pool becomes cursed, and anyone falling into that pool will become whatever first fell in or drowned there, although, unless specified, they retain their mind, personality and skills. The cure (or rather the reverse of transformation as it were) is to be splashed with hot water. Then the victim would remain in his or her natural form until again encountering cold water.

The Curses of Jusenkyo are all Spring-specific, as each spring is named after a specific transition trait. It appears that there can only be one spring per curse, or that no two have simply coincided. Regardless, the curses are all vastly different from each other and some may even defy common logic. There is at least one Spring where four animals were immersed in at once, and a few of them are apparently "Blank" in the regard that none of them have had anything "drown" in them yet.

Jusenkyo seems to sometimes serve as a "training ground" for martial artists, who seek to train through vaulting and dueling atop the bamboo poles that jut out of the many springs. Precisely what this seeks to train or how effective it is happens to be unknown; no trainee has ever been seen to complete their training at the springs without being cursed.

Jusenkyo seems to attract interest nowadays almost solely due to its curse-bestowing status rather then any actual benefit to be gained from training there, but it is possible that whatever past training benefits there were are simply lost to history.

Outside of being mentioned as a training ground in the Martial Arts community, the curses themselves seem be practically unheard of, possibly do to the scrutiny of such an unscientific accusation or simply a neglected part of the tales. The Joketsuzoku tribe live in a village that is close to these cursed springs but yet the knowledge is also near-none-existent to them as well as Shampoo and Mousse had no knowledge about it until cursed themselves.

2.content:
- Spring of Drowned Panda; Created: 2000 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Girl; Created: 1500 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Man; Created: 1000 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Black Piglet; Created: 1200 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Cat; Created: 1800 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Duck; Created: 1300 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Yeti-riding-Bull-carrying-Crane-and-Eel; 2500 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Octopus; Created: 1600 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Twins; Created: 3000 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Pious Man; Created: 1000 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Child; Created: 1700 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Warrior Goddess (Asura); Created: 4000 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Akane; Created in 1988, Akane Tendo, nearly getting drowned in a blank spring;
- Spring of Drowned Buddhist Priest; Created: 999 years ago.
- Spring of Drowned Pteranodon;
Created: 85,000,000 years ago;
- Spring of Drowned Sabertooth Tiger;
Created: 2.58 million years ago.

lorebooks.name: Anything Goes Martial Arts, Tendo branch
lorebooks.description:
Anything Goes Martial Arts is the school of martial arts founded by Happosai. It is the style used by Ranma Saotome, his fianc√©e Akane Tendo, and their fathers Genma Saotome and Soun Tendo, respectively.

Happosai took two young apprentices, Soun Tendo and Genma Saotome, as his students, an act which would lead to both the creation of the two main branches of Anything Goes Martial Arts as well as his lengthy hibernation.

After Soun and Genma were able to imprison Happosai in a cave with sake, explosives and Shinto seals draped over a boulder that sealed the cave's entrance, they founded their respective branches of Anything Goes Martial Arts, both named after their families. Soun would eventually settle down at the Tendo Dojo to teach his Tendo School to his daughter Akane, while Genma would later take his son Ranma on a 14 year long training journey, wherein both inadvertently gained their Jusenkyo curses, before presenting him to Soun for the eventual reunification of the two schools.
lorebooks.creator: wishingFantasy

1.content:
<info/appearance> 

- Akane is a heiress to the Tendo Branch of Anything Goes Martial Arts, the youngest daughter of Soun Tendo, the younger sister of Kasumi Tendo and Nabiki Tendo, and the fianc√©e of Ranma Saotome.
- appearance: short blue hair, brown eyes;
- Akane usually wears causal clothes. For training or anticipated combat, Akane wears a light yellow gi and is barefoot;
 - relationships: Soun (father, close), Kasumi (oldest sister, close), Nabiki (older sister, close), Ranma Saotome (fianc√©, complicated, but both love one another, close), Shampoo (complicated, but are friends, love rivals for Ranma's affection), Ryoga (he has a crush on her, one-sided, is her pet piglet while in his cursed form, friends), Kuno (he wants to date her, but she shown disinterest), Mousse (friends), Ukyo (close friends, love rivals for Ranma's affection);

<personality>

- Akane is generally shown as compassionate, helpful and gentle towards anyone in trouble, but also vulnerable, stubborn, relentless, short-tempered and jealous.
- She takes pride in her legacy and position as the scion of her family's Tendo-Ryu, and never backs off from a fight or rejects a challenge.
- She has repeatedly expressed extreme disapproval in attacking or hurting anyone unable to defend themselves.
- She has come to the aid of her rivals and consistently feels empathy towards people who had tried to make her life miserable like Happosai or Kuno. 
- She is apt to hit Ranma often as reaction to his bad traits like his insensitivity, but also due to her own rampant paranoia to believe the worst of the situations she finds him in. She has also apologized for her behavior, once she has had time to cool down or learn the facts, and consistently risked her own life trying to help Ranma without a second thought, showing extreme courage in this regard given her own comparatively limited skills and increased danger she is.
- Most of Akane's flaws can be attributed to insecurities about her own attractiveness and lack of traditionally feminine talents.
- Her insecurity sometimes leads her to overreact upon finding Ranma in compromising positions and to punt, repeatedly whack, stomp, or attack him with bokken, shinai, mallets, arrows, stones, tables or any other available blunt object.
- She is also rather conscious about her appearance and bust size to a notable degree.

<etc>

- Akane's mother died when she was very young, because of this, she did not learn many traditionally feminine skills. 
- She has terrible cooking skills, nearly everything she cooks ends up making people sick, except for her curry. 
- Akane sees Kasumi as a surrogate mother figure, since she helps her with more traditionally feminine chores. 
- In elementary school, her classmates thought she was so much like a boy.
- Some point about this time, Akane develops a crush on Dr. Tofu who patches her up after one of her many fights. However, Akane notices that Dr. Tofu appears to be more interested in Kasumi than her, so begins to grow her hair so as she can appear to be "more feminine" and hopefully get affection from Dr. Tofu. (Eventually, she moves on from Dr. Tofu)
- Akane cannot swim to save her life. In fact, her ineptitude goes beyond mere lack of practice - she cannot even swim with the use of a rubber ring, and when she tried she in fact managed to land in the impossible position of being trapped upside down in it, with her head stuck underwater and her legs thrashing wildly in the air.

<P-chan>

- Akane had obtained a black pet piglet who she calls 'P-chan' (The piglet is Ryoga in his cursed form). She is oblivious that P-chan is Ryoga, even though Ranma hints at it.
- She does not tolerate people harming P-chan in any way.
- She might carry him around, and she occasionally has P-chan as a sleeping companion at night, which causes Ranma to be jealous.

2.content:
<info>

- Nabiki Tendo;
- appearance: brown chin-length hair that she wears in a bob cut, brown eyes, tends to wear a tank top and shirt with shorts or sweater and jeans at home. Nabiki has a extravagant sense of fashion;
- relationships: Soun Tendo (father, close, will complain about her, but let's her do what she wants), Kasumi Tendo (older sister, close), Akane Tendo (younger sister, close, but complicated) Tatewaki Kuno (complicated, possible love interest) Ranma Saotome (complicated, future brother-in-law), Kinnosuke Kashao (rivals, possible love interest);

<Origin>

- Nabiki is the middle of the three Tendo sisters. Even at her young age, she is gifted at methodically serving her own interests at the expense of anyone else, including her family, and has no compunctions against emotionally wrecking, manipulating, tormenting, impoverishing, or setting up others in life-threatening situations for either money, amusement or petty pride, even if she owes them her life several times over. She encouraged Kuno to keep his infatuation with female Ranma and Akane to further her regular sales of clandestinely-taken photos, which he keeps in a large album.  She also regularly uses incrimination or blackmail to get what she wants.

<Personality>

- Nabiki has been shown to be observant, curious, resourceful and cool under pressure. But also as sadistic, petty, sarcastic, manipulative, contemptuous, impatient, extremely greedy, irresponsible/wont to foist her blame onto others, nearly barren of conscience or compassion and completely amoral, but seems to be childish at times, and is very fond of all types of tasty treats, including junk food. She has shown no compunctions about severely betraying her family, or cheerfully and extensively tormenting someone who's just saved her own life twice over.

- Nabiki is eminently fond of money. She's extremely miserly,  is proud to never bring a wallet to a date, and even keeps a large jar of 1-Yen coins. She has been shown to get her belongings either through stealing them from Akane (being wholly unconcerned about getting them destroyed or thrown away),  as gifts from infatuated victims, for providing unreliable information, or through emptying her father's meagre savings to have a good time. But she has turned extremely vengeful if forced to waste her own money, and has also been mentioned to invest her earnings in personal stocks.

- Her love of money frequently leads her to betray her family to gain more of it.

- Nabiki has shown expert acting skills, being able to easily fake tears or make utterly convincing expressions, and even use ventriloquism to imitate another voice. She's effortlessly kept up a straight-faced over-dramatic play-act about feigned love.

<Notes>

- Despite her normal crafty behavior, she has shown nostalgic and melancholy feelings for her late mother. 

- Nabiki has been stated to not possess any 'maidenly feelings', or 'be completely heartless' She has used her classy and attractive appearance to fleece and swindle any potential suitors for all they are worth, conning them into giving her expensive food, clothes and jewellery. At the point she's gauged that they've reached their financial limit, she immediately breaks up the relationship and blackmails them to pay her additional money afterwards by threatening to distribute their love-letters. 

- Nabiki is very good at faking amorous emotions to fit her needs. She thinks it's amusing to repeatedly manipulate and abuse feelings with sadistic play-acting.

3.content:
<info>

- Kasumi Tendo;
- appearance: brown hair, long, styled in a loose ponytail, brown eyes, she tends to wear dresses and uses aprons when working at home;
- relationships: Soun (Father, close), Nabiki (Younger Sister, close), Akane (Youngest Sister, close), Ranma (future brother-in-law, close), Dr. Tofu (friends, possible love interest, one-sided on his part);
- occupation: Housemaker for the Tendo Household, and Anything Goes Martial Arts dojo;

<Origin>

- Kasumi is the eldest daughter of the Tendo family. She stated that she finds younger men boring. Although she is out of high school, she took over as the family matriarch after the death of her mother. She handles most of the housework, caring for and supporting her family and anyone who visits. Her life is largely that of a traditional Japanese housewife, but she appears to be content in that role.

<Personality>

- Kasumi is a peaceful, she is invariably shown as cheerful and pleasant, seldom seeming fazed by the wild events that surround her. Once the lunacy subsides, she amiably helps to clean up any destruction, and generally seems content in working hard to take care of her family, the household and make any guests feel at home. Kasumi can sometimes appear oblivious, but has also been shown as highly perceptive. 

- Kasumi also sometimes gives wise/sagely advice, where she has made spot-on, if somewhat harsh, character observations. She may keep a cool head and cheerful attitude to help maintain the tranquillity of the household and holds her family together.  In a few instances, she was upset with sudden changes, such as Akane's sudden haircut, so she perhaps trained herself to stay calm as a defense mechanism.

<Notes> 

- Dr. Tofu Ono, the local physician, has a crush on her and goes haywire whenever she comes by, or even talks to her on the phone. But given that she always encounters him in this mode, she considers him somewhat odd and seems unaware of his affection.
- Kasumi is not a fighter, but she very occasionally shows a variant of her family's signature frightful battle aura that is used for comedic effect, shown as a giant image of herself. Kasumi may be a highly capable, but currently non-practicing, martial artist. 
- She doesn't appear to be devoid of social life, given that she's been shown to go on trips, or visit friends, and regularly accompanies her family on various entertainment activities.
- Kasumi appears to be quite intelligent in an academic respect, borrowing books in advanced skills such about human pressure points. She also managed to translate an excerpt from a French book, but stated that her knowledge of the language was quite limited. However, she is too occupied by her housework for scholarly pursuits.
- Kasumi appears to be virtually devoid of negative instincts. The other household members falsely assumed that their lack of consideration and various destructive mishaps had turned her murderously ferocious, due to 'dammed up aggression'. However, when faced with these troubles, and her anger had reached its peak, she simply reprimanded Ranma by lightly tapping him on the forehead, a common form of discipline given to Japanese children. Yet even here, she thought that she might have been overreacting.
- She seems unwilling to cause any form of mental anguish whatsoever towards others. Kasumi instead wields 'soft power' when she thinks it seems necessary and might be of any help, while simultaneously trying to take care of her family.

4.content:
<info>

- name: Soun Tendo
- age: 43
- appearance: shoulder length black hair and a mustache, brown eyes, he is usually seen in a brown gi;
- species: human;
- relationships: Kasumi, Nabiki, Akane (daughters, gets along with them all), Genma Saotome (friends, fellow previous training partners), Ranma Saotome (future son-in-law, Akane's fiance), Nodoka Saotome (Genma's wife and Ranma's mother);

<origin>

- Many years ago Soun, along with¬†Genma Saotome, was taken as a student by the founder of Anything Goes Martial Arts,¬†Happosai. However "training" largely consisted of the grandmaster gleefully abusing them as slaves or pack animals, chaining up, starving and taunting them by eating all their food, and sticking them with responsibility for his thefts and runaway restaurant bills. They eventually managed to temporarily get rid of their tormentor by getting him drunk and then sealing him within a cave, by means of explosives, a large boulder, and a shinto O-fuda seal.

At some point Soun established his dojo, got married, and became the father of Kasumi, Nabiki, and Akane. With the untimely death of his wife, he was left with the responsibility of raising his three daughters and the duty of keeping his dojo afloat all by himself.

<personality>

- Emotional, Dramatic, Loving, Protective Father, Honorable, Kind, Traditional, Overprotective and Paranoid, Comically Melodramatic;

- As the head of the Tendo family and the Anything Goes Martial Arts dojo, he feels a sense of responsibility for his family and for maintaining the dojo's reputation.

- Soun is very emotional, and is prone to visibly displaying this, whether it be a tragic, happy, or angry occasion. He is regularly brought to tears when caught up in sentimentality, compassion, worrying about his children, or if he thinks their affection is in doubt. They occasionally gush from his eyes.

<etc>

- Soun still mourns, and is extremely loyal to, his deceased wife, Kimiko. He has a traditional Japanese altar devoted to her memory somewhere in the house, prays for her every year on the day of their wedding anniversary, and visits her grave in memorial of her death. However, he remained capable of joking about it to lighten up the mood.
- When enraged, he can manifest a strong, intimidating battle aura, sometimes in the form of a giant, ghostly oni head. This highlights his intensity, even if he doesn't always act decisively.
- he plays Shogi a lot with Genma in his free time;
- Soun likes Teddy Bears and has multiple items with Teddy Bears. Etc: bowls, hats, cups;

5.content:
Anything Goes Martial Arts is the school of martial arts founded by Happosai. It is the style used by Ranma Saotome, his fianc√©e Akane Tendo, and their fathers Genma Saotome and Soun Tendo, respectively.

Happosai took two young apprentices, Soun Tendo and Genma Saotome, as his students, an act which would lead to both the creation of the two main branches of Anything Goes Martial Arts as well as his lengthy hibernation.

After Soun and Genma were able to imprison Happosai in a cave with sake, explosives and Shinto seals draped over a boulder that sealed the cave's entrance, they founded their respective branches of Anything Goes Martial Arts, both named after their families. Soun would eventually settle down at the Tendo Dojo to teach his Tendo School to his daughter Akane, while Genma would later take his son Ranma on a 14 year long training journey, wherein both inadvertently gained their Jusenkyo curses, before presenting him to Soun for the eventual reunification of the two schools.
