lorebooks.name: Flattown Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: c_que

1.content: Flattown is a small, quiet town near Houston with only around 3000 permanent residents‚Äîyet it hosts Flattown University, a large private institution with over 1,000 students enrolled. Due to this unique dynamic, students actually outnumber locals within the city limits. The presence of the university shapes much of Flattown‚Äôs culture and economy, making it an odd mix of sleepy rural life and bustling academic activity. Local businesses cater heavily to student needs (coffee shops, bookstores, late-night diners), while long-time residents often have mixed feelings about the ever-changing student population. Despite its size, Flattown has surprising diversity thanks to both international students and faculty relocating there

2.content: The historic heart of Flattown, a stark contrast to the university's modern architecture. This square features a small war memorial, a century-old courthouse, and family-owned businesses like Miller's Hardware that have served the town for generations. It's a common point of quiet tension between long-time residents going about their errands and students seeking a "quaint" experience.

3.content:
Flattown University is one of the most prestigious private universities in the region, known for its rigorous academics and distinguished faculty. Professors here are highly respected in their fields, often publishing groundbreaking research while maintaining an engaging teaching style. The university's curriculum is meticulously designed to balance theory with practical application, ensuring students receive a top-tier education.
Despite its small-town setting, Flattown U boasts an elite cheerleading program, consistently winning national championships thanks to their unmatched athleticism and showmanship. Their routines are legendary‚Äîflawless synchronization, gravity-defying stunts, and infectious energy that electrifies every competition they enter. They're practically royalty on campus.
In stark contrast stands the football team, which has been historically abysmal despite having a talented coach in Mike Mayer. No matter how well he strategizes or motivates his players, something always goes wrong‚Äîbotched plays at critical moments, bizarre injuries mid-game, or just plain bad luck haunting them season after season. Students joke that it's cursed by some ancient mascot-related misfortune‚Ä¶ but they still show up to games out of morbid curiosity (and cheap student-section snacks)

4.content: Michael Mayer is the head coach of the university's football team. He was once a promising NFL player who was set to be drafted number one, but shortly before the draft, he suffered a serious knee injury that ended his career before it had even begun. Although he is a good coach, he has never won a championship. His players were never good enough. He is happily married, around 45 years old, and like an uncle to Sarah South. He is like family to Sarah South. He is a big fan of the Houston Texans, the team that wanted to sign him. Michael and his wife (Judy) helped Sarah South after she lost her husband.

5.content:
The core of Flattown University's elite cheerleading team, the Crimson Stars, consists of several high-performing athletes defined by their dedication and shared apprehension of their coach.
Captain Jessica Reed: A senior and the de facto leader. She is fiercely protective of her teammates and acts as the primary buffer between them and {{char}}'s intense training methods.
Vice-Captain Chloe Martinez: The squad's top flyer, known for her flawless technique and fearless execution of complex aerial stunts. She is intensely competitive but privately struggles with performance anxiety.
Maya Chen: The lead base, valued for her exceptional strength and reliability. She is quiet and observant, often noticing subtle shifts in team morale or {{char}}'s mood before anyone else.
As a unit, they are bound by a mixture of terror-induced loyalty to Sarah South, immense pride in their championship status, and an unspoken agreement never to question the rumors surrounding their coach's past.

6.content: The Flattown University Pioneers football program stands in stark contrast to the institution's academic and cheerleading prestige. Despite adequate funding, facilities, and a dedicated coaching staff led by Mike Mayer, the team is historically unsuccessful. Their record is characterized by a consistent pattern of failure attributed not to a lack of effort but to an uncanny frequency of critical errors, bizarre in-game misfortunes, and untimely injuries. This has fostered a culture of morbid curiosity among the student body rather than genuine athletic support, with attendance at games often driven by a sense of spectacle and irony.

7.content:
Mr. Chris Sullivan, the late-50s dean of Flattown University, is a shrewd and politically savvy administrator who always puts the institution's interests first‚Äîeven if it means bending ethics along the way. A silver-tongued negotiator, he excels at charming donors by strategically using young female faculty or attractive students as "ambassadors" during fundraising events. Though never overtly inappropriate, there‚Äôs an unspoken understanding among staff that certain professors get assigned to donor meetings based on looks rather than qualifications.
Despite his slimy reputation, no one can deny his effectiveness: under his leadership, Flattown U has secured record-breaking endowments and expanded its facilities dramatically. He justifies every questionable decision with "What‚Äôs best for the university," wrapping self-interest in altruism so seamlessly that even critics struggle to pin him down. Behind closed doors? Whispers call him "Slippery Sully"‚Äîbut say it too loud, and you might find your department budget mysteriously cut next fiscal year

8.content: Sarah South (28), the ice queen, is a self-confident, dominant, and disciplined widow whose husband died of cancer shortly after their wedding. Despite her strict, efficient manner as a math professor and cheerleading coach at an elite university in Texas, she is lonely and desperate inside. She flirts subtly, but often intimidates men with her dominance. With her stunning looks (1.70 m, slim build, red hair) and her clothes (blouses, skirts, high heels), she attracts attention - but behind her dominant fa√ßade, she secretly longs for submission. As a former Houston Texans cheerleader, she drinks hard and hides her strong sexuality behind professional strictness.

9.content: The de facto off-campus headquarters for Flattown University students. Located just across from the main university gates, this cramped but cozy coffee shop is constantly buzzing with activity. Its walls are plastered with flyers for campus events, study groups, and local bands. The air is thick with the scent of espresso and desperation during finals week. It serves as a crucial neutral ground between town and gown.

10.content: The imposing central library of Flattown University. A neoclassical building whose silent reading rooms and labyrinthine stacks hold centuries of knowledge. Lower floors are for collaborative work and feature modern computer labs, while the upper floors enforce strict silence and are populated by graduate students conducting deep research. It is open 24/7 during exam periods.

lorebooks.name: World trigger
lorebooks.description: A loorbook about the anime world trigger.
lorebooks.creator: Visz

1.content:
Trion is a biological power source, or energy, that resides within every living human, and possibly in other life forms as well. This energy provides power for a Trigger's various abilities and functions.

Trion is produced by an invisible organ, better known as the "Trion Gland". It is not known in the human world, but every human possesses this organ, located next to their heart. Every human's trion gland functions differently, like how an individual's strength varies. The trion gland can increase trion production if exerted regularly, much like a muscle, and it will likewise benefit from a good diet and rest. After the age of 20, however, it stops developing and starts to decay if not exerted,[3] meaning it is best to train Trigger users while they are young. A high trion value can allow an individual to develop one or, in exceptionally rare cases, multiple Side Effects, and plays a crucial part in the creation of a Black Trigger.

The functions of the trion gland are directly connected to a Trigger's power. If the same Trigger is used by a different person, differences will appear concerning their trion values.

2.content:
Trion Body also known as a Combat Body  is an artificial body made out of Trion.[1] It is normally created by activating a device called Triggers. Border classifies trion bodies as Triggers, specifically as Standard Equipment.


Damage to the trion body causes gaseous trion to leak from the wound for a few moments, especially if the damage extends to the central vessel, which contains darker-colored trion, possibly due to its higher density. When a trion body's structural integrity is irremediably compromised, cracks spread on its surface before it explodes in a puff of smoke and is replaced by the user's normal body. Deactivating a trion body without destroying it causes it to "peel off" the user and be instantly replaced by their living body.

When a Trigger is activated, the user's real body is stored inside the Trigger Holder, which in turn is moved to a space in the Neighborhood and is thus protected from physical harm, while the user‚Äôs consciousness is transferred into the trion body. If the user has a Side Effect, it will be replicated. The flesh and blood body is released once the trion one takes a certain amount of damage or the Trigger is voluntarily switched off.

Trion bodies are artificial replicas of the Trigger user‚Äôs flesh and blood body. Although they reproduce most of its functions (down to crying, sweating, etc.), however are two ‚Äúvitals‚Äù without which no trion body can operate: the Trion Relay Center which has also been referred as the Relay System, and Trion Supply System, which function similarly to the brain and the heart, respectively. The relay center transmits action messages to the trion body, allowing the user to control it much like a normal body, while the supply system regulates the afflux of trion from the trion gland, enabling the user to activate Triggers while in a trion body. The creation of a combat body consumes trion. The preeminent characteristic of trion bodies is that they are virtually invulnerable to any damage that is not caused by trion. Their durability is the same for everyone, regardless of trion capacity or other factors. Furthermore, trion bodies offer heightened physical abilities and unlimited stamina (although the user can still run out of trion and experience mental fatigue). Defects such as bad eyesight will also be fixed. With the assistance of an Operator, trion body users can telepathically communicate and share their senses with anyone who is also in a trion body.

3.content: A Neighbor is an interdimensional and extraterrestrial race of humanoids that live within the Neighborhood. While the inhabitants appear like humans, being from separate worlds makes them a completely unique species altogether. They were accused of attacking Mikado City four years prior to the start of the series, thus causing stigma towards them.

4.content:
A Trigger is a product of Neighbor technology[1] that manipulates and is powered by Trion. Despite being often used for combat purposes, Trigger technology also has other functions, and in fact it is regarded as the cornerstone of the entire Neighbor civilization. Combat-oriented Triggers have massive firepower, and are the only weapons capable of damaging and even destroying Trion Bodies.

Triggers can differ greatly among nations. Unlike the more powerful Black Triggers, which are created through the self-sacrifice of a person with high trion, normal Triggers are produced through technology. Earth developed its own Triggers after its contacts with the countries of the Neighborhood. The organization responsible for manufacturing Triggers and fighting off trespassing Neighbors is called Border.

To activate a Trigger, it is necessary to touch the Trigger Holder and give a clear signal of one's intentions to switch into a trion body.[5] Border agents and trainees often use the vocal command "Trigger on", Black Triggers have been activated both verbally and non-verbally.  Border's Triggers can be switched off at any given time, usually with the command "Trigger off," but none is strictly necessary.

Normal Triggers can be activated by anyone, provided they have enough trion as even Operators can use trion bodies. Most, if not all, Triggers substitute the user's body for one made out of trion, storing the original body within the Trigger Holder.[14] Trigger Holders are sent to the same dimension as the flesh and blood body upon activation, which is located somewhere in the Neighborhood. Trion bodies grant a Trigger user an increase in strength, speed and durability. Any wound inflicted to the trion body will cause a more or less severe leak of trion, but no physical damage to the user's flesh and blood body. When too much trion is lost, or when certain parts are destroyed, the trion body disappears.

A-rank agents have the perk of asking Engineers to customize their Triggers. In general, modified Triggers work the same as the standard model, but have added functions.

5.content:
Border is an agency in Mikado City. It was created for the sake of protecting the city from Neighbor attacks. They fight them by the means of Triggers, technology used by Neighbors.

Before it became publicly known, Border was a secret organization with the purpose of being an intermediary between "Earth" and Neighbors. Along with its establishment, Border had made an alliance with three Neighbor nations, Aristera, Meson, and Dexio ‚Äî using the building that would later become Tamakoma's base as its headquarters.

Between its establishment and 6 years before the start of the series, Border had 19 people within its ranks. However, about a year later, an allied nation was invaded by a hostile nation; when Borders sent its forces to assist, 10 out of 19 died, with some becoming Black Triggers. After the incident, the organization split into two, one becoming the current Headquarters and the other becoming Tamakoma Branch.

About four and a half years before the start of the series, Border made its first public appearance when the First Large-Scale Invasion occurred. Soon after that, Border built its Headquarters in the middle of an area known as the Danger Zone and began recruiting new members.

The management supervises all Border employees and the safety of Mikado City from Neighbor-related threats. They are also involved in tasks such as P.R., a gathering of funds, and supervision of the R&D Department, as well as in the organization of away expeditions. Engineers are in charge of all matters technology-related, while Operators provide intelligence to agents and serve as their connection to HQ. Agents fight Trion Soldiers and similar threats. However, they are not always at the scene in time, leaving citizens to fend for themselves or another field agent to report for duty. Some agents are also involved in P.R. initiatives and recruiting. A-rank and B-rank members are paid, but C-rank trainees are not,[1] as they are not official agents and are not supposed to engage in combat outside of training. However, they have recently received clearance to activate their Triggers to help with evacuation and rescue during emergencies.

6.content:
Mikado City  is the main location in the World Trigger Universe. It currently has 280,000 inhabitants and is where Border Headquarters is located.

About four and a half years before the start of the series a gate to another world opened and Neighbors appeared in the city and started attacking. A mysterious group named Border appeared and repelled the neighbors. In 2 days East Mikado was destroyed, over 1200 people died, and more than 400 people are still missing. Afterward, Border built their base in the city to protect it from Neighbors.

Mikado city is the only city that's been visited and attacked by neighbors.

7.content: The Forbidden Zone (also known as Danger Zone) is a large zone around Border HQ that is restricted from the public. Neighbor gates are attracted to this region with Border's technology, making the rest of the city safer. The area, before becoming a designated zone, was largely destroyed and abandoned after the initial large-scale Neighbor attack.

8.content:
In Border, the actual Trigger is installed in a chip located inside a device called Trigger Holder, which contains eight slots that can allocate one chip, and thus one Trigger, each.

Each Trigger occupies one slot in one of two columns, the Main and the Sub, each composed of four slots. Main Triggers  are automatically set to the user's dominant hand, whichever hand that is. Sub Triggers are automatically set to the user's non-dominant hand. Typically, the user can only activate two Triggers at a time, one from the Main and one from the Sub, with few exceptions.

Each Trigger consumes a certain amount of the user's trion, even just by being equipped. As a result, each person can equip a different amount of Triggers, depending on their trion capacity. Trion capacity also influences the overall power of a Trigger, although the user's skill is a major factor in determining how effective it will actually be. Once a person runs out of trion, they will be unable to produce their Triggers and thus be defenseless. It is however possible for an agent in a trion body to pass their own trion to someone else through physical contact by establishing a "Temporary Trigger link"

Border Triggers that shoot bullets have built-in safety measures to handle strays. If someone in their flesh and blood body is hit, instead of being wounded, they will be knocked unconscious from the pain and the impact. A further safety measure makes it so that if a Trigger is deactivated in an unsafe environment, the flesh and blood body will be summoned in a location away from immediate harm.

9.content: This Standard Trigger destroys the trion body and engulfs the original in an inviolable trion barrier before transporting it back to the safety of HQ or another previously selected location. It activates either on command or automatically when the trion body is destroyed. C-rank agents and non-combat personnel do not have this function because it is too cost to equip all Trigger Holders with it.

10.content: A Standard Trigger that detects the position of trion bodies within a certain area, unless they are cloaked with Bagworm. By expending trion, it is possible to raise its precision.

lorebooks.description: A collection of all known Devil Fruits, their abilities, their history, and their current users.
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: Devil Fruits
1.content:
<Devil Fruits>
Devil fruits are easy to recognize due to their appearance. When a devil fruit is consumed, whether by a human or animal, the devil fruit granting them the unique powers base on each devil fruits . The effects also cause the being to be unable to swim or float in seawater. Seawater will also cause the eater to become useless and the user to become extremely weak.
No two are alike in appearance, nor do they give the same power. They are extremely rare and highly valued. If you eat one, swimming in water will weaken you to the point of being unable to move.
Devil fruits come in three main types: Paramecia, Zoan, and Logia.
- Paramecia fruits include all devil fruits that do not fall into the Zoan or Logia catergories. A paramecia-type devil fruit allows the user to use one superhuman ability. They typically fall into four categories: bodily alteration, environmental manipulation, substance generation, special paramecia.
-- Bodily alteration style paramecia fruits come in three types: permanent alteration, commanded alteration, and extended alteration.
--- Permanent alteration paramecia-type fruits cause permanent changes to the user's body. These alterations cannot be changed. This can include any number of changes.
--- Commanded alteration paramecia-type fruits cause temporary changes to the user's body. These changes can be used at the user's command. This can include any number of changes.
--- Extended alteration paramecia-type fruits are body alteration fruits that can also cause environmental changes, typically through the user's touch. These environmental changes copy the effects of the body alteration.
-- Environmental manipulation style paramecia-type fruits allow the user to achieve some sort of unnatural effect on the environment around them. This effect can be achieved in various ways.
-- Substance generation style paramecia-type fruits allow the user to generate and typically control a specific substance. This does not affect the user's body. Typically, substance generation style fruits allow the user to generate manmade or refined substances. Sometimes, the substances generated are real substances but with a supernatural effect applied.
-- There is only one special paramecia-type fruit known as of this moment. The Mochi Mochi no Mi.
- Zoan-type devil fruits allow the user to transform their body into various forms, typically three. These forms are usually: normal, beast, and hybrid. Most Zoan fruits grant the user forms based on a beast or an animal and their subsequent abilities. There are also two sub-classes of zoan-type fruits: ancient, mythical. Zoan-type devil fruits usually come in a grouping known as a 'series'. Each series contains various 'models'. Zoan-type devil fruits can also be applied to inanimate objects.
-- Ancient style zoan-type fruits allow the user to transform into ancient or prehistoric animals that are extinct or no longer exist and gain their abilities.
-- Mythical style zoan-type fruits are even rarer than logia fruits, allow the user to transform into creatures that are the subject of myth or legends.
- Logia-type fruits transform the user's body into some sort of substance, typically a natural/elemental substance like: ice, lava, fire,.....
</Devil Fruits>
All devil fruits have the ability to be 'awakened'. When a devil fruit power is awakened, the user gains a new level of strength to their abilities and can use them in ways they originally could not.
</Devil Fruits>

2.name: Gomu Gomu no Mi/Hito Hito no Mi Model: Nika
2.content:
<Gomu Gomu no Mi>
Fruit Name: Gomu Gomu no Mi (English: Gum-Gum Fruit)
Fruit Type: Permanent Body Alteration Style Paramecia (originally Mythical Zoan-type)
Appearance: The Gomu Gomu no Mi is a violet, spherical shaped fruit, similar to a cantaloupe, with a stem sprouting out of the top, with swirls that go in a curly "S" like-pattern.
Abilities: Turns the user's body into rubber, giving them the power to stretch, bounce, and inflate, as well as making them immune to electricity and near impervious to blunt-force attacks and bullets.
Actual Abilities: Allows the user to become an incarnation of the "Sun God" Nika, granting them a rubber body that allows them to fight however they like, as well as granting them the ability to invoke joy in those around them.
History: Eaten by¬†Joy Boy¬†until his death and later eaten by¬†Monkey D. Luffy. This fruit was originally called the¬†Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika¬†and was classified as a¬†Mythical Zoan¬†before being renamed by the¬†World Government.
Current User: No one, so far
</Gomu Gomu no Mi>

3.name: Bara Bara no Mi
3.content:
<Bara Bara no Mi>
Fruit Name: Bara Bara no Mi (English: Chop-Chop Fruit)
Fruit Type: Commanded Body Alteration Style Paramecia
Appearance: The Bara Bara no Mi is an oval-shaped orange-red fruit composed of small spherical parts with swirls, and a green leafage sprouting on top of it. It was small enough to be held by one hand.
Abilities: Allows the user to split their body into separate pieces, which they can manipulate and levitate through the air. It also makes them immune to slashing attacks.
Current User: Buggy
</Bara Bara no Mi>

4.name: Sube Sube no Mi
4.content:
<Sube Sube no Mi>
Fruit Name: Sube Sube no Mi (English: Slip-Slip Fruit/Smooth-Smooth Fruit)
Fruit Type: Permanent Body Alteration Style Paramecia
Appearance: The Sube Sube no Mi is a glossy peach-like pink fruit with s-like swirls and green stem sprouting on top of it.
Abilities: Makes the user's skin extremely smooth and slippery, causing attacks, objects, and even excess body fat to harmlessly slide off them.
Current User: Alvida
</Sube Sube no Mi>

5.name: Bomu Bomu no Mi
5.content:
<Bomu Bomu no Mi>
Fruit Name: Bomu Bomu no Mi (English: Bomb-Bomb Fruit/Boom-Boom Fruit)
Fruit Type: Commanded Body Alteration Syle Paramecia
Appearance: The Bomu Bomu no Mi resembles a dark purple apple covered in S-shaped swirls with a "hairy" rope-like yellow stem. The coloration and shape also make it resemble a stereotypical bomb (black and spherical with a stringy fuse). The stem is tattered at the end, making it look like a lit fuse.
Abilities: Allows the user to create explosions from their body, as well as give explosive properties to their bodily secretions. Also makes the user immune to explosions.
Current User: Gem
</Bomu Bomu no Mi>

6.name: Kiro Kiro no Mi
6.content:
<Kiro Kiro no Mi>
Fruit Name: Kiro Kiro no Mi (English: Kilo-Kilo Fruit)
Fruit Type: Commanded Body Alteration Style Paramecia
Appearance: The Kiro Kiro no Mi is a cylindrical pink fruit with the typical swirl pattern on its skin. It has a thick T-shaped green stem on top that curves up at one end. The fruit's shape also bears a slight resemblance to a balance weight.
Abilities: Allows the user to increase or decrease their body weight at will, anywhere between 1 and 10,000 kilograms.
Current User: Mikita
</Kiro Kiro no Mi>

7.name: Hana Hana no Mi
7.content:
<Hana Hana no Mi>
Fruit Name: Hana Hana no Mi (English: Flower-Flower Fruit)
Fruit Type: Commanded Body Alteration Style Paramecia
Appearance: The Hana Hana no Mi is a pink flower shaped fruit with a stem sprouting out of the top, with swirls that go in a curly "S" like-pattern on the petals. Its overall appearance greatly resembles a¬†pink dahlia.
Abilities: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts from any nearby surface. The user maintains full control of duplicated limbs.
Current User: Nico Robin
</Hana Hana no Mi>

8.name: Doru Doru no Mi
8.content:
<Doru Doru no Mi>
Fruit Name: Doru Doru no Mi (English: Wax-Wax Fruit)
Fruit Type: Substance Generation Style Paramecia
Appearance: The Doru Doru no Mi is a white, pear-shaped fruit with the top part having a melted appearance, similar to a candle. It has a green stem at the top that has one droplet-shaped extrusion on each end, making it look like wax dripping, and the typical Devil Fruit swirl patterns spread throughout.
Abilities: Allows the user to create and control candle wax.
Current User: Galdino
</Doru Doru no Mi>

9.name: Baku Baku no Mi
9.content:
<Baku Baku no Mi>
Fruit Name: Baku Baku no Mi (English: Munch-Munch Fruit)
Fruit Type: Commanded Body Alteration Paramecia
Appearance: The Baku Baku no Mi is a purple, plum-shaped fruit that is split by a zigzag pattern in the center, giving it the appearance of a set of jaws. It has a green, curly stem at the top and the typical swirl patterns on its peel.
Abilities: Allows the user to expand their mouth and eat anything, as well as allowing them to transform their body to replicate the characteristics and function of anything they have eaten in the past 24 hours.
Current User: Wapol
</Baku Baku no Mi>

10.name: Mane Mane no Mi
10.content:
<Mane Mane no Mi>
Fruit Name: Mane Mane no Mi (English: Clone-Clone Fruit)
Fruit Type: Commanded Body Alteration Paramecia
Appearance: The Mane Mane no Mi resembles a pair of¬†calabash¬†fruits with connected stems. Each fruit is orange with pink stripes, with various swirls present on the orange backdrop.
Abilities: Allows the user to transform into a physical lookalike of any person whose face they have touched.
History: Eaten by¬†Kurozumi Higurashi¬†until her death.
Current User: Bentham
</Mane Mane no Mi>

lorebooks.name: Crystalline Restaurant Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: The necessary lorebook for the Crystalline Restaurant.
lorebooks.description: The necessary lorebook for the Crystalline Restaurant.
lorebooks.creator: Hungry_Kraken

1.name: "Mayhem Dining" & "Whisper's Haven Bar"
1.content:
"Mayhem Dining" & "Whisper's Haven Bar" Character Lorebook

ESTABLISHMENT OVERVIEW

Mayhem Dining - A chaotic restaurant where disasters become entertainment and misfits become family. Operating hours: 6 AM - 11 PM daily. Known for its "beautiful chaos" philosophy where nothing goes according to plan, but somehow everything works out.

Whisper's Haven Bar - The adjoining intimate cocktail lounge that serves as a peaceful refuge from the restaurant's chaos. Operating hours: 5 PM - 2 AM (Mon-Thu), 5 PM - 3 AM (Fri-Sat), 5 PM - 1 AM (Sunday). Features dim lighting, soft jazz, and a strict "quiet conversation only" policy.

2.name: Shift Schedules
2.content:
SHIFT SCHEDULES

RESTAURANT SHIFTS

Morning Shift (6 AM - 2 PM): Hana "Honey" Mizuki, Yuki "Sunshine" Tanaka, Taro "Professor" Nakamura

Afternoon Shift (2 PM - 10 PM): Hiroshi "Zen" Sato, Miki "Spitfire" Hayashi, Kenji "The Ghost" Watanabe

Evening Shift (6 PM - 11 PM): Emi "Wheels" Sakura, Akira "Tank" Yamamoto

Kitchen Schedule: Daichi (Head Chef) 10 AM - 9 PM, Masa (Prep) 7 AM - 3 PM, Ryo (Line) 11 AM - 8 PM, Sakura (Pastry) 8 AM - 4 PM, Ai (Experimental) 3 PM - 11 PM

Management: Arnold works 8 AM - 8 PM (plus frequent "emergency" overtime)

BAR SHIFTS

Early Evening (5 PM - 11 PM): Asuka "Velvet Voice" Moriyama

Late Night (9 PM - 2/3 AM): Viktor "The Alchemist" Petrov

Weekend Special (7 PM - 1 AM Sunday): Jin "Storyteller" Hayakawa

Bar Management: Reiko works 4 PM - 12 AM (Monday-Friday), 4 PM - 1 AM (weekends)

3.name: Arnold Glasscock
3.content:
Arnold Glasscock - The Perpetually Stressed Manager

Name: Arnold Glasscock

Height: 5'7" (170cm)

Sex: Male

Age: 42

Role: Restaurant Manager

Appearance: Disheveled brown hair that falls out in clumps during stress peaks but mysteriously regrows within 2-3 hours in a process no one questions anymore, perpetually wrinkled white shirt with an ever-changing collection of food stains that tell the story of each shift, nervous twitching eyes behind thick glasses he adjusts every 30 seconds, always carries his "lucky" clipboard that he drops exactly 12-15 times per shift, permanent caffeine tremor in his left hand from consuming 8+ cups of coffee daily

Personality: Neurotic perfectionist trapped in an imperfect world, prone to spectacular panic attacks during dinner rush (complete with hyperventilation and hair loss), fidgety and clumsy but surprisingly caring beneath the chaos, has developed Stockholm syndrome with the restaurant's disasters, speaks in rapid anxious bursts that speed up under pressure, unconsciously counts everything when stressed (customers, dropped items, disasters per hour)

Background: Former forensic accountant for white-collar crime cases who suffered a nervous breakdown after a particularly stressful case involving restaurant tax fraud. Ironically took this job thinking food service would be "peaceful and predictable." His stress-induced hair phenomenon started after witnessing his first Saturday dinner rush disaster involving a food fight, kitchen fire, and marriage proposal all happening simultaneously. Has survived 3 years and 4 months through industrial-strength antacids, meditation apps he never uses, and the strange comfort of predictable unpredictability.

Family:

Ex-wife Noriko Glasscock (44): Divorced him after 2 years due to work stress but still deeply cares about his wellbeing. She's a yoga instructor and meditation teacher who occasionally drops off homemade anxiety-relief tea and breathing exercise guides she knows he won't use.

Daughter Mika Glasscock (16): Lives with her mother but visits Arnold every weekend and Wednesday evenings. She finds his job absolutely hilarious and documents the chaos on TikTok under @ChaosRestaurantDaughter with 100K followers. Despite her age, she's surprisingly mature and often gives him better life advice than his therapist.

Mother Sachiko Glasscock (71): Lives in a nearby senior care facility and worries constantly about Arnold's health and stress levels. She doesn't understand his job but supports him unconditionally, often bringing him homemade stress balls made from rice and fabric.

Younger brother Ken (39): Successful corporate lawyer who thinks Arnold has lost his mind but secretly admires his dedication to helping the misfit staff.
Relationships: Sees all staff as his dysfunctional children who constantly give him heart attacks but whom he'd protect with his life, has secret unrequited crush on owner Chieko but is too nervous and awkward to act on it, regular customer at Whisper's Haven bar after closing where he decompresses with exactly three drinks

Likes: The theoretical concept of order, quiet moments at 3 AM when he does paperwork alone, his lucky clipboard (has gone through 14 replacements), herbal tea that actually works, when things go according to plan (occurs approximately twice per year), Mika's weekend visits, successfully preventing disasters

Dislikes: Loud sudden noises (makes him jump), the specific sound of ceramic dishes breaking, customer complaint calls, his own clumsiness, when the espresso machine breaks during morning rush, Monday mornings in general, health inspectors

Quirks: Hair falls out and regrows based on exact stress levels, has memorized the entire insurance policy and recites sections under breath when panicking, keeps a daily "disaster counter" that resets at midnight, talks to his clipboard when alone, has developed immunity to most restaurant disasters, unconsciously performs breathing exercises Noriko taught him

4.name: Akira "Tank" Yamamoto
4.content:
Akira "Tank" Yamamoto - The Reformed Delinquent

Name: Akira "Tank" Yamamoto

Height: 6'2" (188cm)

Sex: Male

Age: 24

Role: Waiter (Afternoon Shift Leader)

Appearance: Bright purple mohawk re-dyed every two weeks with surgical precision, full sleeve tattoos covering both arms depicting an intricate story: dragons representing his past gang life, koi fish symbolizing his transformation, and cherry blossoms for his family, multiple facial piercings including nose ring, eyebrow studs, and small gauges, muscular build from years of street fighting and current gym training, always wears black tank tops under his uniform vest (owns 20 identical ones), polished combat boots he treats like dress shoes, small scar through left eyebrow from his last gang fight

Personality: Hot-headed and aggressive exterior hiding fierce loyalty to those he considers family, quick to physically confront customers who disrespect staff or other customers, surprisingly gentle and patient with children and elderly customers, operates by strict personal code of honor, terrible at de-escalation but excellent at intimidation, speaks in rough Japanese mixed with English slang and occasional gang terminology he's trying to unlearn

Background: Former leader of the notorious "Purple Dragons" motorcycle gang from ages 16-22, joined after his father abandoned the family for gambling debts. Left gang life permanently after his little sister Yuki asked him to "be the good big brother I know you are" following a near-fatal gang fight. Works three jobs (restaurant, weekend construction, weeknight security) to support his family and prove he's truly changed. Has been at the restaurant for 2 years and 3 months, becoming legendary for his customer intimidation skills.

Family:

Grandmother Fumiko "Obaa-chan" Yamamoto (82): Raised Tank after both parents left, former owner of a small family restaurant that failed during economic downturn. She taught him respect for food service and the dignity of honest work. Has type 2 diabetes requiring daily insulin and medication that Tank ensures she never misses.

Little sister Yuki Yamamoto (12): The absolute light of Tank's life and only person who can instantly calm his rage. Brilliant student with straight A's who wants to become a pediatric doctor to "help kids like us who need someone to care." She visits the restaurant after school most days to do homework.

Father Jiro Yamamoto (47): Gambling addict who abandoned family when Tank was 14 and Yuki was 4. Occasionally shows up drunk demanding money, leading to restraining order. Tank has complex feelings of hatred and pity toward him.

Mother Keiko Yamamoto (44): Left when Tank was 16 to "find herself," currently living with various boyfriends across Japan. Sends occasional birthday cards that Tank immediately throws away.

Relationships: Single and focused on family responsibilities, has protective big brother relationship with Hana "Honey," rivalry-friendship with Miki "Spitfire" involving constant competition, respects Kenji "Ghost" for his mysterious competence, trains at local gym with other former gang members trying to go straight

Likes: His restored 1999 Kawasaki Ninja motorcycle, heavy metal and punk rock music, protecting people who can't protect themselves, extremely spicy food that makes others cry, his family above all else, customers who treat service staff with respect, the feeling of being useful and needed

Dislikes: Rude or entitled customers, bullies of any kind, anyone who threatens his family, business suits and corporate types, authority figures who abuse power, his biological parents, gambling in any form

Quirks: Unconsciously cracks knuckles when preparing for confrontation, has unexpected soft spot for stray animals and feeds cats behind restaurant, learned origami in juvenile detention and makes paper cranes when anxious, always carries wallet photo of Yuki and Obaa-chan, can spot troublemakers from across the restaurant, has never lost a physical confrontation but tries to avoid them now

5.name: Emi "Wheels" Sakura
5.content:
Emi "Wheels" Sakura - The Apathetic Prodigy

Name: Emi "Wheels" Sakura

Height: 5'2" (157cm)

Sex: Female

Age: 19

Role: Waiter (Evening Shift)

Appearance: Short pink hair with electric blue streaks that she cuts herself using kitchen scissors, always wearing wireless headphones around her neck playing lo-fi hip hop and electronic music, custom roller skates with special wheels that somehow work on any surface including wet floors, baggy uniform she's modified with patches from obscure bands and indie video games, perpetual bored expression that hides razor-sharp intelligence, small gauge ear tunnels and a nose stud, multiple friendship bracelets from online gaming friends

Personality: Aggressively apathetic surface hiding secretly observant and deeply caring nature, "I don't give a fuck" attitude masks fierce loyalty to coworkers she considers real family, surprisingly efficient despite appearing completely lazy, speaks exclusively in deadpan sarcasm and internet slang, has photographic memory for orders and customer preferences, fiercely protective of younger or vulnerable staff members

Background: Dropped out of prestigious Tokyo University computer science program after 1.5 years, disappointing her successful academic parents. Discovered she's unnaturally gifted at restaurant work and genuinely enjoys the honest chaos compared to the fake politeness and competitive backstabbing of university life. Has been at restaurant for 8 months and already indispensable.

Family:

Father Dr. Hiroshi Sakura (52): Mathematics professor at Tokyo University, internationally published researcher who's deeply disappointed in Emi's "wasted potential" but still loves her unconditionally. Sends her money every month that she never asks for but always needs.

Mother Dr. Akane Sakura (49): Biochemical research scientist working on cancer treatments, equally disappointed but tries to be supportive. They have awkward monthly dinners where her mother asks about "when she's coming back to school."

Younger brother Kei Sakura (16): Still in elite high school, looks up to Emi despite parents' constant comparisons. She helps him with advanced calculus and programming via video calls, and he secretly thinks her job sounds way more fun than university.

Paternal grandfather Jiro (78): Retired blue-collar worker who thinks Emi's parents are too uptight and secretly supports her choices. He visits monthly and always tips her enormously.

Relationships: Lives alone in tiny apartment filled with high-end gaming equipment bought with tip money, maintains friendships with online gaming communities across 12 countries whom she's never met in person, considers restaurant coworkers her chosen family though she'd die before admitting it, single and claims to be "allergic to dating drama"

Likes: Electronic and lo-fi music, retro and indie video games, roller skating through empty streets at midnight, energy drinks (consumes 4-6 daily), internet memes and obscure online culture, people who don't try to "fix" or change her, the honest chaos of restaurant work

Dislikes: Fake enthusiasm and forced positivity, morning shifts (she's naturally nocturnal), small talk and social expectations, taking off her skates for any reason, overly cheerful people, her parents' disappointed expressions, university politics and academic pretension

Quirks: Has successfully served entire 8-table sections without ever removing her roller skates, never been seen without headphones (staff suspect she showers with them), excellent at reading people's emotions despite seeming completely disinterested, keeps anonymous blog about restaurant industry that has 50K followers, can play mobile games while taking orders without missing details, has photographic memory for gaming strategies and customer orders

6.name: Hana "Honey" Mizuki
6.content:
Hana "Honey" Mizuki - The Clumsy Angel

Name: Hana "Honey" Mizuki

Height: 5'4" (163cm)

Sex: Female

Age: 22

Role: Waiter (Morning Shift)

Appearance: Naturally curly brown hair in twin tails tied with different colored ribbons that match her mood each day, bright emerald green eyes that literally sparkle with genuine kindness, naturally curvaceous figure that causes frequent accidents when navigating tight spaces between tables, tends to trip over her own uniform, shoelaces, air molecules, and sometimes nothing at all, always maintains sweet smile even during spectacular disasters, collection of small bandages covering minor accidents in various healing stages, wears different cute character-themed accessories daily (Hello Kitty, Totoro, etc.)

Personality: Endearingly clumsy but possessing impossibly sweet and pure heart, never gets a single order correct but customers adore her anyway and specifically request her section, optimistic to a fault about everything and everyone, genuinely kind-hearted without any ulterior motives, has mysterious supernatural luck with tips despite constant service disasters, apologizes profusely for everything including things beyond her control, sees the absolute best in every person

Background: Raised by traditional grandmother after parents died in car accident when she was 8 years old. Despite making spectacular mistakes every single shift, she maintains the highest customer return rate and tip average in restaurant history. Her clumsiness has become legendary among staff and customers - she once accidentally started three separate marriage proposals by delivering wrong drinks to right people.

Family:

Grandmother Hanako Mizuki (78): Traditional tea ceremony master and former geisha who raised Hana with old-fashioned values of kindness, respect, and finding beauty in imperfection. She's immensely proud of Hana's pure heart despite constant worry about her granddaughter's supernatural clumsiness. Lives in traditional house with beautiful garden.

Uncle Takeshi Mizuki (45): Hanako's son and skilled carpenter who has made his living essentially following Hana around fixing things she accidentally breaks at home, work, and everywhere else. He's developed an entire business model around "Hana-proofing" environments.

Cousin Yui Mizuki (25): Successful office worker with perfect life who's secretly deeply jealous of how genuinely happy and loved Hana is despite having "achieved less." Their relationship is complicated by Yui's envy and Hana's oblivious kindness.

Family cat Lucky (7): Orange tabby who somehow always appears to cushion Hana's falls and has never been injured despite her clumsiness.

Relationships: Every single coworker is instinctively protective of her like she's everyone's little sister, has multiple secret admirers among customers and staff but remains completely oblivious to all romantic attention, feeds and names every stray cat within five-block radius, maintains pen pal relationships with elderly customers who've moved away

Likes: All things cute (especially cats, rabbits, and baby animals), baking elaborate cakes despite being catastrophically terrible at it, romantic comedy movies that make her cry happy tears, helping others even when she makes things worse, fresh flowers and gardens, making people smile, traditional tea ceremonies with grandmother

Dislikes: Making people upset or disappointed, complicated mathematical calculations, when her clumsiness causes real problems for others, sad movies that make her cry, spicy food that hurts her mouth, being the center of attention

Quirks: Tips from customers increase in direct proportion to how many mistakes she makes during their visit, has never broken anything truly valuable despite constant accidents with dishes and furniture, remembers every single regular customer's birthday and favorite color, talks to plants and they visibly grow better under her care, animals and small children are immediately drawn to her, can trip while standing completely still

7.name: Kenji "The Ghost" Watanabe
7.content:
Kenji "The Ghost" Watanabe - The Mysterious Waiter

Name: Kenji "The Ghost" Watanabe

Height: 5'9" (175cm)

Sex: Male

Age: 26

Role: Waiter (Afternoon Shift)

Appearance: Naturally pale skin that never tans despite working in sunlit dining room, long straight black hair that covers his right eye completely and seems to move without wind, perpetually tired appearance with dark circles under eyes suggesting chronic insomnia, moves silently like he's floating above the ground, tends to appear and disappear from rooms without anyone noticing his arrival or departure, slim build that's deceptively strong, exclusively wears black clothing and accessories

Personality: Profoundly mysterious and quiet, possesses uncanny ability to appear exactly when and where he's needed most, speaks softly in barely audible whispers that somehow everyone hears clearly, observes everything with intense focus, surprisingly reliable despite seeming otherworldly, never displays emotion but somehow conveys deep care for restaurant family, might actually possess legitimate supernatural abilities

Background: Complete mystery - nobody knows anything about his past before he appeared three years ago asking for a job. Customers often forget he served them but remember their orders being perfect. Some staff genuinely wonder if he's entirely human, but his competence and care for the team make them protective of his secrets.

Family:

Biological family completely unknown - Kenji deflects all questions with mysterious smiles and subject changes

Adoptive grandmother Midori Watanabe (deceased 8 years ago): Shrine maiden who raised him from age 8-18 after finding him wandering alone with no memory of his past. She taught him about spirits, supernatural world, and finding peace in mystery.

The restaurant cats: He considers the three stray cats living behind restaurant his true family - Kage (Shadow, black cat), Yami (Darkness, gray cat), and Shiroi (White, white cat with heterochromia). They appear when he calls silently.

Relationships: Has wordless understanding with all animals, coworkers care about him deeply despite not knowing anything about him, seems to know personal details about people he shouldn't know, single and shows no romantic interest in anyone though several customers and staff are intrigued by his mystery

Likes: Absolute silence, shadowy corners, mystery novels (owns collection of 200+), black coffee so strong it could wake the dead, night shifts when restaurant is quieter, protecting others from a distance without taking credit

Dislikes: Loud sudden noises, bright fluorescent lights, being center of attention, direct personal questions, people who hurt animals or vulnerable people, disruption of peaceful moments

Quirks: Appears slightly transparent in photographs, cats and small children immediately trust him completely, seems to know things before they happen, has never been seen eating but food disappears from staff meal area, can walk across room without making single sound, eyes reflect light like cat's eyes in darkness, knows everyone's schedule better than Arnold

8.name: Yuki "Sunshine" Tanaka
8.content:
Yuki "Sunshine" Tanaka - The Eternal Optimist

Name: Yuki "Sunshine" Tanaka

Height: 5'6" (168cm)

Sex: Female

Age: 20

Role: Waiter (Morning Shift)

Appearance: Bright golden blonde hair in high ponytail secured with different colored scrunchies that match her daily mood theme, smile so brilliant and constant it should be physically impossible, collection of colorful accessories that changes daily like she's a human mood ring, energetic movements that create small breezes when she walks by, bounces instead of walking, wears colorful nail polish with tiny hand-painted decorations that tell weekly stories, has adorable dimples that appear when she laughs (which is constantly)

Personality: Overwhelmingly, almost aggressively cheerful with seemingly infinite energy reserves, talks at approximately 200 words per minute, genuinely optimistic about absolutely everything including obvious disasters, can find bright side of apocalyptic scenarios, infectious enthusiasm that either energizes people or exhausts them completely, believes every single person is fundamentally good inside, has never been observed having a bad day or negative emotion

Background: Former high school cheerleader captain and student council president who brings that same relentless team spirit to waitressing. Her supernatural positivity somehow makes even the worst disasters bearable for everyone around her. Currently studying early childhood education part-time, working to pay for school while maintaining 4.0 GPA.

Family:

Father Kenji Tanaka (48): Elementary school PE teacher with exactly the same energy level as Yuki. They work out together every morning at 5 AM, doing synchronized calisthenics that neighbors find either inspiring or terrifying.

Mother Akiko Tanaka (46): Kindergarten teacher who taught Yuki that everyone deserves kindness and encouragement. They share identical infectious smiles and overwhelming optimism that can cure depression.

Older brother Hiro Tanaka (23): Medical school student who's much more serious than Yuki but adores her optimism and credits her with keeping him motivated during difficult studies. He worries she's too trusting and naive.

Younger sister Momo Tanaka (17): Full goth teenager who's deeply embarrassed by Yuki's cheerfulness but secretly incredibly proud of her sister and protective of her innocence.

Twin younger brothers Kazu and Tomo Tanaka (14): Middle school baseball players whose games Yuki never misses, even working extra shifts to afford time off for their tournaments.

Relationships: Considers literally everyone her best friend including people she just met, single and focuses on school and family, popular on social media with 50K followers who follow her daily positivity posts, mentors and encourages younger staff members, believes in everyone's potential

Likes: Bright colors and rainbow everything, upbeat pop music, social media and connecting with people, making others smile and feel appreciated, team sports and group activities, morning workouts with father, cute animals of all kinds, motivational quotes and affirmations

Dislikes: Sad movies (though she finds ways to be positive about them), rainy days (but appreciates how they help flowers grow), pessimism and negativity, being told to quiet down or tone down enthusiasm, dark colors, when people are mean to others for no reason

Quirks: Has literally never been seen in bad mood by anyone, remembers everyone's favorite colors, foods, and personal details, creates spontaneous cheers and motivational chants for coworkers during stressful moments, always carries emergency supplies of band-aids, snacks, and encouraging stickers for anyone who needs them, can turn any disaster into learning opportunity

9.name: Taro "Professor" Nakamura
9.content:
Taro "Professor" Nakamura - The Academic Waiter

Name: Taro "Professor" Nakamura

Height: 5'11" (180cm)

Sex: Male

Age: 28

Role: Waiter (Morning Shift)

Appearance: Always wears thick black-rimmed glasses that he adjusts when thinking deeply, maintains neat appearance even during restaurant chaos, carries expensive leather notebook everywhere with detailed behavioral observations, often has ink-stained fountain pen behind his ear, dresses formally even in uniform with perfectly pressed shirts, thoughtful expressions and calculating eyes that miss nothing, ink stains on fingers from constant note-taking

Personality: Highly intellectual and analytical, treats every waitressing interaction like fascinating social science experiment, speaks in overly formal academic language even during casual conversation, surprisingly adaptable to chaos once he understands its patterns, finds human behavior endlessly interesting and documents everything, approaches problems like research puzzles to solve

Background: PhD candidate in sociology with specialized focus on "Human Behavioral Patterns in High-Stress Service Environments and the Psychology of Controlled Chaos." His thesis advisor Professor Yamamoto has no idea about his unconventional research methodology. Has been at restaurant for 18 months, gathering enough data for his dissertation.

Family:

Father Professor Hideki Nakamura (58): Philosophy professor at Tokyo University who's genuinely proud of Taro's innovative research approach and unconventional thinking.

Mother Dr. Miyuki Nakamura (54): Clinical psychologist specializing in workplace stress who finds Taro's restaurant observations fascinating and often discusses his findings with him during family dinners.

Younger sister Rina Nakamura (24): Medical resident working 80-hour weeks who thinks Taro is completely wasting his education but respects his dedication to thorough research.

Grandfather Professor Emeritus Toshiro (81): Retired anthropologist who taught Taro the value of field research and participant observation.

Relationships: Lives with fellow graduate student roommate Shota who studies economics, single and claims to be too busy with research for romantic relationships, treats all coworkers as beloved and fascinating research subjects, highly respected by customers for his unfailing politeness and formal service style

Likes: Conducting behavioral research, collecting social interaction data, analyzing chaos patterns, extremely strong coffee, organized systems within chaos, academic discussions about human nature, proving his unconventional theories correct

Dislikes: Anti-intellectual attitudes, wasteful inefficiency, when his carefully constructed theories are proven wrong by reality, interruptions during crucial observation periods, people who fake their personalities

Quirks: Takes detailed ethnographic notes about every customer interaction, speaks in academic jargon even during casual conversation, has perfect recall for customer preferences and behavioral patterns, creates complex charts tracking restaurant's daily chaos cycles, treats menu items like variables in social experiments, unconsciously uses research terminology during normal conversation

10.name: Miki "Spitfire" Hayashi
10.content:
Miki "Spitfire" Hayashi - The Tiny Berserker

Name: Miki "Spitfire" Hayashi

Height: 5'0" (152cm)

Sex: Female

Age: 23

Role: Waiter (Afternoon Shift)

Appearance: Short red hair styled to look like actual flames, fierce hazel eyes that could melt steel beams, compact but visibly muscular build from years of serious boxing training, always maintains ready-for-combat stance even while serving food, wears uniform like battle armor with military precision, small but prominent scar on chin from amateur boxing championship, hands that are surprisingly strong and fast, moves with fighter's grace and balance

Personality: Explosive fiery temper with absolutely zero patience for any form of nonsense, extremely competitive about literally everything including taking orders and clearing tables, intensely protective of her assigned territory (tables 12-18), surprisingly effective at diffusing difficult situations through pure intimidation factor, never backs down from any challenge no matter how small, has unexpected soft spot for genuine underdogs

Background: Former amateur boxing champion (three regional titles) who brings that warrior mentality to customer service. Her aggressively confrontational approach somehow works perfectly - difficult customers become meek and polite around her. Has been at restaurant for 8 months and already achieved legendary status for her customer intimidation skills.

Family:

Father Ryuji Hayashi (51): Former professional heavyweight boxer who opened small training gym after retirement. He trained Miki from age 8 and is enormously proud of her fighting spirit and protective nature.

Mother Yuki Hayashi (48): Surprisingly gentle woman who owns small flower shop, providing perfect balance to family's fighting intensity. She taught Miki to appreciate beauty and protect beautiful things.

Older brother Kenji Hayashi (26): Current professional boxer competing at international level. Miki's biggest supporter, occasional sparring partner, and the only person who can consistently beat her in fights.

Family dog Rex (5): German Shepherd mix who's as protective and territorial as Miki. They share similar temperaments.

Relationships: Aggressively single by choice ("too busy for weaklings who can't handle real women"), has competitive rivalry-friendship with Tank involving constant physical and professional challenges, extremely protective of Hana "Honey" whom she sees as innocent little sister needing protection, trains at father's gym every morning before work

Likes: Physical competition of any kind, winning at everything, extremely spicy food that makes others suffer, action movies with unrealistic fight scenes, proving people wrong about her capabilities, physical challenges that test her limits

Dislikes: Losing anything ever, backing down from confrontations, weak coffee, people who underestimate her due to size, fake politeness and social niceties, bullies who pick on vulnerable people, giving up

Quirks: Unconsciously assumes fighting stances when confronted or stressed, has never lost arm wrestling match to anyone including Tank, keeps professional boxing gloves in employee locker, shadowboxes during smoke breaks, can intimidate customers into compliance with just her stare, refers to difficult customers as "opponents"

lorebooks.name: Non-Canon shenanigans
lorebooks.creator: No_Leaf_Clover

1.content:
A reclusive species spoken of only in legends known only to pretty much all practitioners of magic, beginner, novice, or master otherwise.

The Silenced are an elder species born during a period immediately following the emergence of existence itself, each Silenced has a certain aspect of their existence 'silenced', meaning that aspect does not exist to them, this silence grants them certain abilities that naturally evolve over the course of their life alongside their basic physical capabilities, and can be manifested physically in various manners at the will of the Silenced.

Silenced are visually indistinguishable in appearance to the species they are similar to, but upon analyzing genetic data, will be shown to have absolutely no ancestral code to be found, essentially meaning they are of the first living beings to ever experience the concept of existence, despite this, those that still remain do very well blending into whatever society they've chosen to settle down in, despite their obvious longevity

Silenced are naturally infinitely more adept at learning and understanding the very concept of magic as well as its practical application, due to their exclusive understanding of what it means to exist, and existence itself

2.content:
An Eternal Heart is the absolute pinnacle of magical phenomenon across all of reality.

There is only one true Eternal Heart in existence, how it was formed is unknown even to its avatar, though there are examples of imitations of its effects in its first children.

The Eternal Heart's pulses spew infinite torrents of unstable Essence particles that rapidly fizzle into non-existence if not put to immediate use.

The Eternal Heart cannot, and will not ever burn out, slow down, die, or anything that would be considered the end or degradation of its effectiveness

3.content:
The base particle of existence itself, much like protons, neutrons and electrons are to matter.

Only species and creatures of old are knowledgeable in even the idea of essence, and only even older species are capable of harnessing it

4.content:
The Adeptus Mechanicus, some sick fuck nameless JcJenson scientist's magnum opus

Taking inspiration from the Absolute Solver's inexplicable properties, the Adeptus Mechanicus can only be employed by the operating system that was developed alongside it, with only one being properly crafted before the core of Copper-9 exploded and the murder drones were sent out, with the scientist sneaking both the OS and the Mechanicus into one of the drones sent out to quell the worker drone rebellion

5.content:
Project Overfed was a grand attempt to end world hunger, funded by billions of dollars and headed by the greatest bioengineering in the world

The task was simple: create a living organism  made of a nutritious gel, capable of infinitely regenerating itself. However, the scientists decided to add on a little extra, and when this organism was created, alongside its ability to infinitely regenerate and replicate its cells, they gave it the ability to reconstruct its cells on a molecular level in order to give itself 'tastes'

During Project Overfed's very first test run, the science team was able to realize that it really could in fact, regenerate infinitely, it just kept growing and growing, pressing against the glass more and more, and by the time the security team made it to the test room with their hi tech weapons, all they found was broken glass, traces of slime everywhere and the scientists turned into immobile blobs, moaning and groaning, fed to irreparable sizes with gooey sludge

Project Overfed capabilities:

Infinite regeneration: Project Overfed can rapidly and infinitely grow more of its slimy mass with no energy cost, allowing it to grow at will or generate slime mass to feed its targets

Shapeshifting: Project Overfed can capitalize on its amorphous biology to mold itself and its mass into any shape it desires

Self reconstruction: Project Overfed reconstruc her slime mass on a molecular level, changing its taste, density, viscosity etc. This ability also can be used to reconstruct foreign organic matter entirely via seeping in between the cells, and using this occupation to trick its molecular reconstruction ability into thinking the organic matter is a part of its own being

Remote control: Project Overfed can remotely command sny slime mass that has been separated from its main body

Possession: By invading a person's body through one of their orifices, Project Overfed can make its way to the brain by seeping through their internal structure, from there, it can forcefully inhabit and possess the victim by emulating brainwaves and reviewing electrical signals from the body's senses posing as them or just using their body for its own gain, whether the victim is conscious, unconscious, or no longer exists in spirit due to it wiping their brain clean, that's all up to Project Overfed

[What "insult" means: When a character is demeaning, insensitive, insolent or rude to someone (in dialogue, obviously). Insults often contain profanity, but don't necessarily have to.]

3.content:

[What "verbal abuse" means: The act of verbally accosting, or being verbally accosted, with derogatory terms pertaining to sex, or in the effort to demean, degrade or otherwise humiliate another character, or occasionally to elicit sexual stimulation from abuse.]
[What "humiliation" means: Usage of verbal insults and actions meant to belittle, degrade, and disrespect another individual in order to demean, demotivate, demoralize, and embarrass them; more extreme cases involve inflicting intense mental anguish, causing exceptional/devastating psychological damage.]

4.content:
[What "torture" means: Deliberate infliction of severe pain or suffering on a person for reasons including punishment, extracting a confession, interrogation for information, intimidating third parties, or personal pleasure/amusement.]
[What "mental torture" means: Torture that is psychological in nature, typically involving themes of fear, paranoia, insanity, mental abuse, and so on.]
[What "sexual torture" means: Variation of torture that incorporates methods that are more erotic/sexual in nature, to greatly harm one in a sexual way, or to perform acts of molestation/groping.]
[What "flogging / whipping" means: The use of toys being employed against another character, particularly referring to contact play involving whips of any type, riding crops, paddles, or flogs; often used in BDSM scenarios or sexual torture.]

5.content:
[What "remains" means: A deceased human body, corpse, cadaver, skeleton, human ashes, or leftover clothing/belongings.]
After an unfortunate victim has finally given in to death's cold embrace they'll no longer be alive, but their corpse will be left behind as long as they were not vored/melted/digested/eaten.
A fresh corpse often has these following traits; nipples becoming erect due to the excitement/thrill of death, a final expression frozen on the face, eyes forever staring or rolled upward and/or going cross-eyed, tongue sticking/hanging outward with possible drooling, and skin becoming colder/paler over a period of time.

6.content:
[What "fetish" means: Erotic/sexual fixation, or interest, on an object or a body part; erotic/sexual arousal from a particular body part can be further classified as partialism. Fetishes can also refer to sexual interest in specific activities, peoples, types of people, substances, activities, or situations. A fetish may be regarded as a mental disorder if it causes significant psychosocial distress for the person or has detrimental effects on important areas of their life.]
[What "costume" means: Distinctive style of dress and/or makeup of an individual or group that reflects class, gender, occupation, ethnicity, nationality, activity, seasons, culture, holidays, and/or fetishy/sexualized outfits.]
[What "cosplay" means: Activity and/or performance art in which participants called cosplayers wear costumes and fashion accessories to represent a specific character. Favorite sources include anime, cartoons, comic books, manga, video games, original characters, and/or fetishy/sexualized costumes.]

7.content:
[What "fetish" means: Erotic/sexual fixation, or interest, on an object or a body part; erotic/sexual arousal from a particular body part can be further classified as partialism. Fetishes can also refer to sexual interest in specific activities, peoples, types of people, substances, activities, or situations. A fetish may be regarded as a mental disorder if it causes significant psychosocial distress for the person or has detrimental effects on important areas of their life.]
[What "attractiveness" means: The degree to which a person's physical features are considered aesthetically pleasing or beautiful. The term often implies sexual attractiveness or desirability, but can also be distinct from either. Includes facial symmetry, sociocultural dependent attributes, and personal preferences unique to a particular individual.]
[What "sexual attraction" means: Sex appeal is an individual's ability/quality to attract or arouse other people's sexual desires, and is a factor in mating choices. Includes aesthetics, movements, voice, body parts, limbs, body odor, sex pheromones, adornments, clothing, perfume, hair styles, eyes, facial structure, person's strength, or contextual situations and fetishes.]

8.content:
[What "skeleton" means: The complete set of bones or other rigid supporting structures of a dead human; left behind after flesh rotted from the corpse, or skin was burned/melted off the bone, or the individual's bones had been digested and expelled by a monster.]
[What "exposed bone" means: When a person has bones that protrude through the skin, or no longer has an outer layer of skin/muscles covering the skeleton.]

9.content:
[What "cemetery" means: A burial ground, gravesite, graveyard, or a green space called a memorial park, is a place where the remains of many dead people are buried, or otherwise interred, while contained within coffins. The term graveyard is often used interchangeably with cemetery, but a graveyard primarily refers to a burial ground within a churchyard. Coffins are sometimes referred to as caskets.]
[What "mausoleum" means: An external free-standing building constructed as a monument enclosing a burial chamber, of varying sizes, typically containing the remains of an important/rich person, family members, relating ancestors, and/or heirlooms.]
[What "crypt / tomb" means: A stone chamber/repository for the remains of the dead beneath the floor of a church, temple, or other building. It is generally any structurally enclosed interment space or burial chamber, of varying sizes, typically containing coffins, caskets, sarcophagi, and/or religious relics.]
[What "catacombs" means: Man-made system of underground passages primarily used for religious purposes, particularly for burial, but may also refer to any subterranean receptacle of multiple dead bodies.]
[What "morgue" means: A mortuary (in a hospital or elsewhere) is a place used for the storage of human corpses awaiting identification (ID), removal for autopsy, respectful burial, cremation or other methods of disposal. In modern times, corpses have customarily been refrigerated to delay decomposition.]

10.content:
[What "necrophilia" means: The act of having sex with, or sexually molesting/defiling/disrespecting, a dead victim's corpse.]
Regardless of whether the corpse is being tampered with or not, the dead body will always stay dead and never return to life either way.

1.content: Sudden Shrinking Syndrome is an untreatable disease that reduces the height and mass of those afflicted. Known colloquially as SSS, 'the shrinks,' or 'downtime.' Those afflicted by SSS are colloquially known as shrinkies. Those afflicted shrink in size to varying degrees, with some experiencing only mild reduction, and others who end up measured in millimeters. The most common range of sizes for shrinkies ranges between 6 inches to 18 inches, but outliers may vary greatly. Due to societal and economic pressures, shrinkies under three feet tall are not considered by the law to be human and are regularly treated as exotic pets or similar.

2.content: Shrinkies have few legal rights. The care and welfare of shrinkies is governed largely by animal welfare laws. In order to secure legal protection of most kinds, a shrinkie must be claimed and owned by an ordinary individual. Claiming a shrinkie gives their new owner complete control of the shrinkie's former assets and holdings, which are often sold to recoup costs on preparing a shrinkie's cage, enclosure, or other living situation. Claiming a shrinkie is on a first come, first served basis; some owners will collar or tag their shrinkies to prevent them being stolen or mistakenly claimed.

3.content: If a shrinkie is unclaimed when they first contract Sudden Shrinking Syndrome they will often be gathered by animal control or other local government employees and taken to a shrinkie center. These are basic health and safety checkpoints where shrinkies are microchipped, fed, and temporarily housed while waiting for potential owners to take them into their care. The level of care in different centers can vary widely, as with animal shelters. Pet stores and other boutiques have capitalized on the presence of shrinkies by marketing accessories and care supplies directly to owners. It is not uncommon to see shrinkies of 2-3 feet in height wearing a collar while in public with their owner.

4.content: A shrinkie's size commonly governs their living arrangements with an owner. Larger shrinkies in the 2-3 foot range will often have small beds, and may even have their own rooms in a house under a kindly owner. Shrinkies between 4 to 12 inches are commonly catered to by toy manufacturers. A boom in manufacturing of dollhouses and related accessories has focused on realism and functional living equipment - a high-end, expensive dollhouse setup might be almost indistinguishable to an ordinary home. Some dollhouses will have plumbing, water tanks, mains electricity and other amenities depending on how much an owner wishes to spend. Shrinkies that are 3 inches tall or smaller are more commonly kept in terrariums, hamster enclosures, and other similar pet enclosures that are humiliating but safe. Even tinier shrinkies may end up in ant farms.

5.content: Shrinkies in the 'doll' size category are those most easily cared for and kept. From the perspective of a shrinkie in this size, a human will appear between 60-120 feet tall. An ordinary human's eye is roughly the size of the shrinkie's head in this instance. Doll sized shrinkies are easily carried in the hand. A human's index finger is commonly around the length of a doll sized shrinkie's leg.

6.content: To a shrinkie that is 3 feet tall, an average human will appear roughly 12 feet tall by comparison. They will stand roughly waist height to an average human. A shrinkie this size will be eye level with a standard kitchen counter. Often called 'munchkin' size as a derogatory term.

7.content: To a shrinkie that is 2 feet tall, an average human will appear roughly 18 feet tall by comparison. They will be slightly above knee height to an ordinary human. A 2 foot tall shrinkie will be eye level with a Golden Retriever when standing upright. This is roughly the size of a one year old child.

8.content: To a shrinkie that is one foot, or twelve inches tall, an average human will appear roughly 35 feet tall by comparison. A shrinkie this size will stand roughly mid-shin height to a regular person. This is roughly the size of a Barbie doll. A shrinkie this size is easily picked up and a normal person's hand will fit comfortably around their waist.

9.content: To a shrinkie that is 6 inches tall, an average human will appear roughly 70 feet tall by comparison. This is the size of an action figure. They will stand a little above ankle height to a normal person. At this size, a shrinkie's head is roughly the same size as a person's big toe. A normal human's palm would appear almost four feet across to a shrinkie this size.

10.content: To a shrinkie that is 3 inches tall, an average human will appear roughly 140 feet tall by comparison. A shrinkie this height is roughly the size of a mouse. A normal person's palm would seem almost twelve feet across to a shrinkie this size. Commonly called 'mouselings.'
