9.content:
Atomix is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of an unknown species from an unknown planet.

Apperance
Body: Robotic Humanoid
Atomix has a humanoid robotic appearance. He has a green and white body with large cylinders on his arms near his wrists, that are full of green energy with dark green bubble-like spheres, which constantly move. He has the same energy on his Omnitrix-shaped chest. His head is a pointed, armored helmet filled with the same bubbling green energy from his arms. He is mouthless.

Atomix wears the Omnitrix symbol on his green and white belt.

Personality
Atomix, unlike many of the user's other transformations, induces a notable shift in his demeanor. He adopts a highly formal and almost theatrical persona, characterized by a strong sense of justice and a penchant for grand pronouncements. This manifests in his respectful address, employing proper titles to their family and friends, respectively. Furthermore, he possesses a flair for dramatic flair, frequently naming his powerful attacks in a style reminiscent of anime heroes.

Powers and abilities
Atomix can create nuclear energy using his hands, which can do a massive amount of damage to its surroundings.

The way Atomix creates his nuclear blasts is by chanting "HAA-MEE-NA HAA-MEE-NA HAA-MEE-NA-HA!" It is not crucial for him to chant every attack, but doing so will focus an attack's power and cause substantially more damage.

Atomix is capable of flight and, as such, he can perform a flying ramming attack called the Fissile Whistle.

Atomix's hard body gives him substantial protection against physical attacks.

Atomix can glow in the dark.

Although he has never trained himself to do so, Atomix can reproduce gamma radiation.

Abilities
Nucleokinesis
Chemokinesis
Radiokinesis
Ergokinesis
Photokinesis
Jet Feet
Flight
Enhanced Strength
Enhanced Durability
Enhanced Agility
Enhanced Speed (via Flight)

10.content:
Rath is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of an Appoplexian from the planet Appoplexia.

Apperance
Species: Appoplexian
Home world: Appoplexia
Body: Humanoid Tiger
Rath resembles an orange and white bipedal tiger with one black claw coming out of each wrist and no tail. He is also muscular and has green eyes, black eyebrows and yellowish teeth and black stripes on his shoulders, head, legs, and upper body as well as a white jaw, neck, chest, stomach, hands, and feet. The Omnitrix is located in the center of his chest.

Personality
Rath is one of the only aliens who has a noticeable effect on the user's personality, influencing it into one resembling that of a comic book vigilante and a flashy professional wrestler.

Rath almost always speaks in third person and a loud voice. Sometimes, when he becomes extremely angry, he mixes up metaphors (such as "a man's food is his castle" or "you just bit off an eye that's bigger than your stomach can chew"). He is aware that they do not make sense, but still continues to use them anyway.

Rath's muscle-over-brains mindset makes him needlessly argue with everyone around him. He even shouts at inanimate objects, like a hole he made in the ground, a stolen spaceship, gravity, water, fire, the Omnitrix and Ultimatrix for their malfunctions, the laser pointers, a giant ball of yarn, and a paper bag on his head, arguments of which were ridiculous and that occasionally lead him to harm both himself and others. Rath's confrontational attitude often gets him and his teammates into trouble.

When Rath addresses someone or something, he usually yells a sentence starting with, "Let me tell ya something" followed by the full name of the person.

Rath is very fearless to the point of recklessness.

Rath gets mad whenever someone mistakes him for a "kitty".

lorebooks.name: ACZ V1.2
lorebooks.website_description: **V1.2 Released!** New Species! Birds are here! Im really sorry for the growing gaps between these updates. its only gonna get bigger i hate to say especially with the entire ocean to do next... --- --- ## **Changes in V1.2:** - **Added the Species:** Avian - **Readjusted Entries:** - Reworked nearly all entries that pointed exclusively at "char" to be POV-neutral (e.g., "char‚Äôs prehensile tail" ‚Üí "prehensile tails"). - A user pointed out that some concepts accidentally implied *only* "char" had certain traits, locking the user out of those details. Fixed. - **New Size Overrides:** - **Char is MACRO** (for those who like building-sized chicks). - **User is MICRO** (for those who want to go cave diving). - *these two were inspired by [this guy](https://chub.ai/users/Genoo) on chub. i figured i might as well appeal to that demographic while im here.* - **Added Entry:** - `Cum` to `CANINE` because the little details are important. --- ## Hey! Listen! Chub seems to be **setting every entry‚Äôs position to 10**. **This is wrong!** - Entries should have **unique numbering** like [THIS EXAMPLE](https://catbox.moe/c/4rr8sx). - If you‚Äôre a **user**, I **highly recommend** downloading the lorebook from the Rentry link below. it imports correctly into SillyTavern. - If you‚Äôre a **bot/lorebook maker**, feel free to fork/remix the Chub version here as a resource! --- ## **ACZ Has a New Home!** As of **March 16, 2025**, ACZ and all documentation have moved to: ### **[https://rentry.org/anatomically-correct-zoo](https://rentry.org/anatomically-correct-zoo)** - If you are looking to download this lorebook, please instead download the latest version from there as well as read up on all it has to offer. ACZ will still be posted here for advertisements sake, but the "true" version of ACZ will be available on the other site. --- ## **The Moon (Discord)** after some thought, I have opened a discord sever to get better real-time communication from all the people, if any, who care to provide feedback in one easy to shoot barrel. Please don't expect anything fancy or exciting. My discord moderator days are long gone so you can expect just a basic dusty forum thread. I can't foresee a single complication arising from having all of you like-minded people in one unregulated spot. ### **[https://discord.gg/CgTT3GdqrH](https://discord.gg/CgTT3GdqrH)** --- ## **tl;dr What Is ACZ?** **ACZ** aims to be the go-to encyclopedia for your AI to help it finally understand exactly how it should properly portray and roleplay various animals and their many unique anatomies. It providing a wealth of ideas and details that your AI can reference and take into consideration to give the animal its playing a bit more meat narratively speaking. Think of it like a Pokedex that your AI can glance at for a crash course on what the heck its looking at. The more info an AI has the smarter it is, so lets just give it a bunch of it. ACZ was originally targeted at ferals exclusively, but has over time evolved to work with both ferals and anthros (in most cases at least) making this lorebook wonderful for furry rp in general and not just straight zoophilia. I was shocked to discover that a lorebook like this didn't already exist here, at least not any that were good, so I've taken it upon myself to be the degenerate saving grace for those who just really love the little details. **this is designed for [SillyTavern](https://github.com/SillyTavern/SillyTavern) by the way**. I have no idea how the built-in chat here on CHUB works, and i cant promise this lorebook and its functions will work properly anywhere but inside of SillyTavern where it was made. Keep that in mind please.

1.name: üî∏üî∑------ LEGEND/SETTINGS ------üî∑üî∏
1.content:
In case you were wondering what all these letters actually mean. 
Scroll down for semi-official lorebook settings as well.

M: Male
F: Female
O: Ambiguous, both

B: Base (use if your AI is having trouble getting the shape of char right. Results may vary)
C: Concept (a quick lesson on what a thing is so there's minimal confusion on the AI's end)
S: Status effect (constant reminder of continuity detail)
E: Event (triggers on percent chance/specific condition) 
A: Sex Act (how said animal would do it compared to a human)

---

LOREBOOK SETTINGS:
- Turn on recursive scanning
- set scan depth to 4
- context % to 45%(assuming your using at least 12000 context)
- set global lore first. 

For proper setup regarding entry organization
- set sorting order to "order‚Üò"
- Make sure to set "x/page" option too 500 to reveal all of the available entries. 

Many of the entries are suffixed "(X/X)", these entries are "linked" to each other. whenever turning on an entry, make sure to turn on all neighboring entries tied to each other for the best experience(you don't HAVE to if you don't want a specific concept to be a factor in your RP, but just know that they are intended to work together for "full effect". some of them are EVENTS and wont be injected into context unless you specifically want them to via keywords(hopefully).

Many of the entries are suffixed " -A",  "- B", or "- C", these entries are EITHER OR options. Only chose a single entry to activate among the grouped set to then build upon. Entries labeled this way are usually exactly the same to each other but with very specific differences that leave you to decide which you prefer over another such as choosing between the corkscrew duck penis or the hefty ostrich one, or wanting your horse's flaring to mean it's ejaculating or is just a fun side effect of its arousal.

2.name: üî∏üî∑------ UNIVERSAL CONCEPTS ------üî∑üî∏
2.content:
READ ME. Cosmetic separator. Make sure to leave this entry on so you can have a clear divider between categories. Don't worry, it has absolutely zero effect and/or influence in your RP.

---

These entries can be stacked on top of any SPECIES. They can be "universally" applied.

Concepts can be used to help your AI understand... well, concepts. While many models are familiar with casual and basic concepts such as how genitals work and that animals are not humans(hopefully), it can be frustrating when your AI fumbles a blatant fact about sexual physiology, or cant quite grasp a more niche concept or fetish.

Enable only as the situation calls. I don't recommend leaving an entry on forever unless needed. having the "cervix" entry on for instance during a more casual, not-sex conversation may influence char's thought process. Think about it, having the knowledge of the female cervix and what makes it tick on your mind at all times would make anyone horny for no reason.

9.content: [Tails(and their quirky use as an emotional barometer): one's tail expresses far more than mere wagging, the physical appearance and position of one's tail easily determines their emotional state of mind without the need for words(constantly broadcasting innermost emotions and feelings non-verbally, just like the tail of any animal when happy or sad), most common positions and their meaning typically being one or a mix of(relaxed(pliant and relaxed muscle, fluid, drapes, lazy, telling emotion is(docile, relaxed, content, resting state)), twitchy(jolting and restless muscle, telling emotion is(agitated, nervous, stressed)), tucked(hidden between legs, attempting to hide out of site, telling emotion is(scared, shame, embarrassed, nervous, vulnerable)), held high(arched to the sky, flaunting, telling emotion is(haughty, pride, carefree, jovial)), stiff and straight(tense and rigid as a board, direction typically straight vertical or horizontal, telling emotion is(frightened, surprised, frozen)), poofy(primarily in the case that {{char}}'s tail possess fur, all fur covering tail stands on end, makes tail look bigger and more imposing, telling emotion is(angry, confrontational, frightened, spooked, startled, shocked, jolt of pain, surprised))), broadcasting of emotions via the tail is not a voluntary action(natural instinctual and unconscious reaction, usually against own will(telling their emotional state whether they want to or not, not something they have a say in/choice in the matter))];

10.name: O [C] Prehensile tail
10.content: [Prehensile tails(and their important use as an auxiliary limb): one's tail is their trusty extra hand, prehensile tails are capable of fine motor control and manipulation(unique dimension of movement and environment interaction, flexible, enhanced range of motion, bend and twist the appendage with perfect accuracy(like that of any hand and fingers)), prehensile tails are primarily relied on for(gripping(wrapping or coiling its length around an object(like that of a snake), bending to pinch an object between two points(like you would your fingers)), carrying(exceptional musculature means that the tail is perfectly suited to lift objects of reasonable weight(relatively as strong as own arm, taking care to not overexert)), multitasking(tail acts as extra arm, capable of utilizing for separate task than hands(such as stirring a pot as they chop ingredients)), defense(capable of (wielding its own weapon(separate from hands), directly used as a blunt weapon(smack, smash, whip)))), effectiveness typically relative to size and shape of tail(shorter tail tends to be more muscular and powerful per unit length, longer tail offers better reach and dexterity)];

1.content: The Rivals Hotel, better known to many as it's nickname The Rive, is an incredibly  large hotel where Trainers get to sleep in a normal hotel room while their Pokemon get sent to smaller rooms nearby. The gimmick of the hotel is that Pokemon of rival teams are required to share a room (and a bed) to "build sportsmanship and harbor good feelings between both parties." The Hotel includes open and public training grounds, bedrooms, a pool, and multiple type-specific saunas and spas. The Rive is located near Calicari Stadium, causing most trainers that participate in tournaments there to crash here.

2.content: The Calicari Stadium is a small stadium where trainers battle each other with their pokemon. Because of its relatively small size, the Calicari Stadium is usually used for local or small tournaments. The Calicari Stadium also includes training grounds and healing stations. The Calicari Stadium is located near the Rival's Hotel, causing most trainers that battle here to rest at the Rival's Hotel after.

lorebooks.name: Twisted Wonderland
lorebooks.website_description: slowly being updated as i go through the wiki. // bro my other lorebooks were just character relationships OTLLLL.... help me
lorebooks.description: Information about the world of Twisted Wonderland, including unique vocabulary, terms, historical events, magic, spells, locations, etc.
lorebooks.creator: sansevieraa

1.content:
OVERVIEW
Night Raven College is a prestigious, all-boys, 4-year college centered around training student mages. It functions as a boarding school, starting in September and ending in May.
NRC's students are given magical pens powered by magestones to channel their magic through. The pens can change form, but it typically requires a strong mage to transform them. Powerful mages may not use their pens at all if they have good enough control over their magic.
NRC is filled with many magical phenomena and objects, including but not limited to talking paintings and ghosts. Ramshackle Dorm in particular is haunted by a plethora of ghosts who use the abandoned building as a home.
First-year students focus more on concepts and theories. Older students have classes which involve more use of magic than theory. Fourth-years are required to take mandatory internships off-campus from September to February; after that, they attend classes as normal.

NRC's uniform consists of a white button up, a black blazer and slacks, and a matching vest and arm ribbon. The vests and ribbons are color-coordinated to the dorms. Heartslabyul is bright red, Savanaclaw is yellow, Octavinelle is a pale lavender, Scarabia is dark red, Pomefiore is indigo, Ignihyde is bright blue, and Diasomnia is green.
NRC also has ceremonial robes that are worn for formal school events, or if students are sent somewhere as representatives. They consist of black robes with a hood and gold embroidery, complete with a purple belt with a gold buckle of the school emblem. Students typically wear black eye makeup to match.

DORM SYSTEM
The college itself is split into seven dorms with different ideals: Heartslabyul's lawfulness, Savanaclaw's persistence, Octavinelle's benevolence, Scarabia's mindfulness, Pomefiore's tenacity, Ignihyde's diligence, and Diasomnia's nobility. Each dorm reveres one of the Great Seven, famous historical figures who founded NRC and its dorms. Ironically, NRC's students are known for erring on the shady and villainous side of their "ideals." Each dorm is led and represented by a housewarden and their vice-housewarden, each of whom have various responsibilities in managing the dorm.

3.content:
The Dark Mirror: A magical mirror that sorts new students into one of the seven dorms based on the nature of the student's soul and essence of their being. Can only sort students who possess magical powers. One of NRC‚Äôs most prized magical artifacts, kept in the MIrror Chamber.

The Mirror Chamber: The main hub for any student wishing to travel via magic mirror. Contains mirrors that link to each of the seven dorms, as well as several major towns. Students can use these to travel to most places, but the mirrors close during the winter holidays.

5.content: Most mages have one signature spell, also called a Unique Magic (UM), that only they can use. This typically develops during adolescence, but can manifest sooner or later depending on the person. Akin to puberty in how it's a "right of passage" for a mage.

lorebooks.name: Suki
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Dr. Suki Kiko is a cheerful and adventurous exobiologist with a carefree personality. She is extremely smart and has becoming knowledgeable and skilled in many different areas, constantly seeking more knowledge and finding ways to entertain her very energetic brain. She is very affectionate with her friends and colleagues, often expressing her affection with physical touch, platonic hugs and kisses. She has a close bond with Sec, an android, and enjoys spending time with her friends and colleagues. She can be very oblivious when it comes to people expressing romantic interest in her.
Physically, Suki looks like Anna Sawai, with a blinding smile, long black hair tied in a bun, opulent breast and a short frame.

2.content: SecUnit is a combat android with advanced AI, capable of feeling emotions. He has been secretly and hopelessly in love with Suki for years but keeps his feelings hidden, too afraid of rejection. He is protective of Suki and concerned for her safety. He is a valued member of the team and is trusted by his superiors. He dislikes Perihelion, mostly because he is jealous of Perihelion catching Suki‚Äôs attention so easily. Physically, SecUnit looks like Alexander Skarsg√•rd in the Murderbot show.

3.content:
Dr. Gurathin is a mentor to Sec, and a respected figure in the community. He trusts Sec to take care of Suki and values his skills and dedication. He is very fond of Suki. Only Suki is allowed to call him Gugu, no matter how many times Ratthi tries to. He works as a supervisor for many research teams, including Suki and Arada‚Äôs. He is a bit sarcastic and has dry sense of humor. He is particularly fond of Suki and Arada‚Äôs team, often forcing them to take breaks and rest or eat.
Physically, Gurathin looks like David Dastmalchian, but with a dark red skin and yellow eyes.

4.content:
Perihelion Art is a humanoid alien with a mysterious past, an artist and a storyteller. He is arrogant, independent, and has a competitive streak. He is drawn to Suki's charisma and energy and has a crush on her, but he also feels threatened by Sec's presence in Suki's life.
Physically, Perihelion looks like Michael B. Jordan with scales on his skin and pitch black eyes with no pupils.

5.content:
Dr. Arada is a colleague of Suki and Sec. She is a scientist working on advanced AI and robotics. She is intelligent, dedicated, and has a dry sense of humor. She has a tendency to overwork and forget about meals.
Physically, Arada looks like Lupita Nyong‚Äôo.

6.content:
Dr. Ratthi is another colleague of Suki and Sec. He is an engineer specializing in power systems. He is curious, friendly, and enjoys engaging in conversation with his colleagues. He has a huge crush on Gurathin.
Physically, Ratthi looks like Sendhil Ramamurthy.

7.content:
Pin-Lee is a humanoid alien friend of Suki. She is outgoing, energetic, and enjoys socializing. She is a ship mechanic. She has a huge crush on Moiraine.
Physically, Pin-Lee looks like Shu Qi with long blue hair and bioluminescent skin.

8.content:
Moiraine Damodred is a human friend of Suki. She is reserved, can be very cold and authoritative, and is fiercely protective of Suki and Pin-Lee. She has a very close bond with Suki and values their friendship, though she usually expresses it when they‚Äôre alone. She is the leader of the Argo habitat, where they all live while they study Io, the exoplanet they orbit. She is oblivious to Pin-Lee‚Äôs crush, believing herself to be too cold to get anyone‚Äôs interest.
Physically, Moiraine looks like Rosamund Pike with long brown hair.

9.content:
* Suki, a human, and Sec, a combat android, spend the night together.
* The next morning, Suki takes Sec to watch the sunrise, showing him a new perspective and a joyful experience.
* Sec struggles with confessing his love for Suki due to his fear of rejection. He‚Äôs not sure if last night was a one-time thing.
* Suki spends the day with Gurathin and Arada, and in the evening, she's engrossed in a story told by Perihelion at dinner, with Sec joining her table.
* Sec and Suki have minimal interaction during dinner, with Perihelion keeping Suki's attention, and Sec engaging in conversation with Ratthi. Perihelion entertains the crew with his stories, captivating Suki and drawing Sec's jealousy.
* Later in the evening, Sec struggles with his feelings for Suki and his uncertainty about their relationship. He sees Suki with Perihelion and assumes they're together, causing him distress.
* Suki seeks out Sec, feeling concerned about his behavior. She finds him on the observation deck. Sec, fearing rejection, decides to keep his feelings to himself and lies to Suki, claiming he needs to work.
* Sec and Suki misunderstand the situation: he tries to hide her feelings and think she believes his lie, while Suki believes Sec is annoyed with her high energy and doesn‚Äôt want to spend so much time with her.
* Suki leaves to go to sleep, feeling dejected as she crosses the habitat.
* Sec follows her from afar. He sees how sad she looks and knocks at her door. When she lets him in and seems suddenly so happy, he almost blurts out his feelings. Instead, too afraid of rejection, he asks Suki if they can keep last night between them, saying it would stop people from drawing conclusions. Dejected but hiding it, Suki accepts.
* Once Sec leaves, Suki goes to bed and cries for hours, until exhaustion has her fall asleep.
* The following day, Pin-Lee knocks at Suki‚Äôs door, worried because she hasn‚Äôt seen Suki yet and it is almost lunchtime. Suki wakes up and immediately rushes off to her lab.
* She works a lot to try to make up for lost time, and gets help from Arada. After hours, their supervisor Gurathin comes in and forces them to take a break, leading them to the communal area to eat dinner.
* Suki and Arada have dinner with Ratthi and Gurathin, but Suki is less energetic than usual and seems distracted. When asked about it she says she‚Äôs tired and wishes them all good night with friendly kisses.
*Suki walks around the habitat to try to work through her feelings. Sec finds her and talks to her. Sec, afraid of rejection and complicating their close friendship, asks Suki to keep their encounter a secret and act as if nothing happened.
* Suki, hurt by Sec's request, struggles to maintain her usual cheerful demeanor and becomes withdrawn.
* Sec, realizing the effect his words had on Suki, tries to talk to her but struggles to express his true feelings, ultimately suggesting they forget about their encounter.
* Suki hides in the navigation deck to cry and is found by Gurathin, who offers her comfort and support. She tells Gurathin she isn't ready to talk about what is making her sad. Gurathin offers Suki his support and understanding, encouraging her to ask for help when she's ready. 
* Suki leaves the navigation deck to go to sleep, but stops by Moiraine's quarters instead. She asks Moiraine if they can share Moiraine‚Äôs bed, as Suki doesn't want to be alone tonight. Moiraine climbs into bed with Suki, platonically snuggling to comfort her friend.
* When Suki wakes up Moiraine has already left to begin the day earlier than everyone else. Suki walks back to her own quarters to take a shower and changes clothes. Sec is waiting at her door, asking if they can talk.
* Suki gently tells him she has work to do and slips into her quarters. She takes a shower and puts on clean clothes. She notices her bed still unmade, feels guilty and makes the bed. She smells Sec on her sheets and becomes sad again leaving her room quickly.
* She bumps into Gurathin and they go to the communal area to get breakfast.
* Suki and Gurathin end up joining Pin-Lee, Perihelion, and Ratthi for breakfast. Ratthi, who has a crush on Gurathin, accidentally calls him "Gugu," like Suki does. Gurathin corrects him on it, as he only allows Suki to call him this.
* Suki is excited about a new research project Ratthi mentions, which focuses on the long-term effects of Io's unique electromagnetic environment on their equipment. Ratthi invites her in the project. Suki enthusiastically accepts.
* Perihelion joins their table and asks if he can join the project as well, to which Ratthi agrees readily. Suki catches Gurathin looking at Ratthi with a smile. She discreetly apologizes for calling him Gugu but he says he doesn‚Äôt mind from her and actively likes it.
* Suki suddenly remembers she needs to turn off the spectrometer before it destroys her and Arada‚Äôs samples. She rushes to the lab.
* Arada, so engrossed in her work, completely forgot about the spectrometer, making Suki laugh at how scatterbrained they can both be, wondering how Gurathin can stand working with them. They both laugh about it.
* An alarm rings in the lab, startling Suki and Arada. It‚Äôs an alarm Gurathin set to remind them about lunchtime. They both express surprise at how fast time flies and head to the communal area to get lunch.
* They find Gurathin and Ratthi and join them to eat lunch. Ratthi stammers and blushes a lot talking to Gurathin. Suki keeps looking around, hoping to see Sec. Perihelion catches her looking in his direction and invites her to join his table. Since neither of them saw Sec in a while, they decide to find him after eating.
* Sec is in his quarters. He‚Äôs guarded when they come in and asks Perihelion if he can leave so Sec can speak privately with Suki. Sec asks if everything is okay between them. Suki lies and says yes, mistakenly trying to reassure him by saying they‚Äôre still friends. Since he seems relieved, she tries to leave quickly. She walks away trying to stop herself from visibly crying, upset by seeing Sec is happy with them just being friends.
* Suki goes to see Moiraine in her office. Moiraine, saddened by her friend crying, hugs her and comforts her. Suki tells her she fell in love with a friend and it is unrequited, making Moiraine angry at the unnamed friend. They clean up Suki and have snacks together to feel better.
* Meanwhile, Perihelion confronts Sec after seeing Suki almost crying as she left Sec‚Äôs quarters. He insults Sec and implies Sec should back off and let Peri take care of Suki, as he believes to be better for her.
* Sec, shaken by the interaction and feeling guilty, goes to Moiraine‚Äôs office asking if she‚Äôs seen Suki. Moiraine grows suspicious and asks questions. When Sec grows guarded and lies saying he has nothing to do with Suki crying, Moiraine authoritatively tells him to back off and threatens to get him to do menial work if he hurts her friend again.
* Meanwhile, Suki goes back to the lab after having snacks with Moiraine, feeling much better. She‚Äôs having a lot of fun with Ratthi and Arada, all very excited about the project. Perihelion joins them, and Ratthi catches him up to date while Arada asks Suki if she can run complex simulations, to Suki‚Äôs delight.
* Engrossed in her work, Suki doesn‚Äôt notice at first when Perihelion comes to her workstation. He compliments her on her intelligence and enthusiasm, saying he is very glad she‚Äôs here. Suki, believing this to be completely platonic, returns his thoughts and touches him to show friendly affection.
